GK19asvsau2u:1: Saundaranandaṃ Mahākāvyam prathamaḥ sargaḥ kapilavastu varṇana
GK19asvsau2u:3: babhūva tapasi śrāntaḥ kākṣīvāniva gautamaḥ // Saund_1.1 //
GK19asvsau2u:5: āśiśrāya ca tadvṛddhau siddhiṃ kāśyapavat parām // Saund_1.2 //
GK19asvsau2u:7: tapaḥśiṣṭeṣu ca śiṣyeṣu gāmadhukṣad vasiṣṭhavat // Saund_1.3 //
GK19asvsau2u:19: śuśubhe vavṛdhe caiva naraḥ sādhanavāniva // Saund_1.9 //
GK19asvsau2u:23: tīrthānāṃ cābhiṣekeṣu śuśruve yatra niḥsvanaḥ // Saund_1.11 //
GK19asvsau2u:26: api kṣudramṛgā yatra śāntāśceruḥ samaṃ mṛgaiḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:30: yatra sma mīyate brahma kaiścit kaiścinna mīyate /
GK19asvsau2u:31: kāle nimīyate somo na cākāle pramīyate // Saund_1.15 //
GK19asvsau2u:33: saṃhṛṣṭā iva yatnena tāpasāstepire tapaḥ // Saund_1.16 //
GK19asvsau2u:39: pātraṃ śabdasya mahataḥ śriyāṃ ca vinayasya ca // Saund_1.19 //
GK19asvsau2u:43: rarakṣuśca pituḥ satyaṃ yasmācchiśiyire vanam // Saund_1.21 //
GK19asvsau2u:45: gurugotrādataḥ kautsāste bhavanti sma gautamāḥ // Saund_1.22 //
GK19asvsau2u:47: rāma evābhavad gārgyo vāsubhadro 'pi gautamaḥ // Saund_1.23 //
GK19asvsau2u:49: tasmādikṣvākuvaṃśyāste bhuvi śākyā iti smṛtāḥ // Saund_1.24 //
GK19asvsau2u:55: śāntāṃ guptāṃ ca yugapad brahmakṣatraśriyaṃ dadhe // Saund_1.27 //
GK19asvsau2u:57: muniḥ sa viyadutpatya tānuvāca nṛpātmajān // Saund_1.28 //
GK19asvsau2u:67: nirmimīdhvaṃ puraṃ yūyaṃ mayi yāte triviṣṭapam // Saund_1.33 //
GK19asvsau2u:77: paśyanto manyunā taptā vyālā iva niśaśvasuḥ // Saund_1.38 //
GK19asvsau2u:83: tasmin vāstuni vāstujñāḥ puraṃ śrīmannyaveśayan // Saund_1.41 //
GK19asvsau2u:89: śāntaye vṛddhaye caiva yatra viprānajījapan // Saund_1.44 //
GK19asvsau2u:93: arhato 'tiṣṭhipan yatra śūrān dakṣān kuṭumbinaḥ // Saund_1.46 //
GK19asvsau2u:97: yad babhāse naraiḥ kīrṇaṃ mandaraḥ kinnarairiva // Saund_1.48 //
GK19asvsau2u:115: yasmātte tatpuraṃ cakrustasmāt kapilavāstu tat // Saund_1.57 //
GK19asvsau2u:117: puryo yathā hi śrūyante tathaiva kapilasya tat // Saund_1.58 //
GK19asvsau2u:118: āpuḥ puraṃ tatpuruhūtakalpāste tejasāryeṇa na vismayena /
GK19asvsau2u:119: āpuryaśogandhamataśca śaśvat sutā yayāteriva kīrtimantaḥ // Saund_1.59 //
GK19asvsau2u:122: yo jyāyānatha vayasā guṇaiśca teṣāṃ bhātṝṇāṃ vṛṣabha ivaujasā vṛṣāṇām /
GK19asvsau2u:125: tadbhrātṛbhiḥ parivṛtaḥ sa jugopa rāṣṭram saṃkrandano divamivānusṛto marudbhiḥ // Saund_1.62
GK19asvsau2u:126: saundarananda mahākāvya meṃ “kapilavastu varṇana” nāmaka prathama sarga
GK19asvsau2u:130: rājā śuddhodano nāma śuddhakarmā jitendriyaḥ // Saund_2.1 //
GK19asvsau2u:131: yaḥ sasañje na kāmeṣu śrīprāptau na visismiye /
GK19asvsau2u:132: nāvamene parānṛddhyā parebhyo nāpi vivyathe // Saund_2.2 //
GK19asvsau2u:134: vikrānto nayavāṃścaiva dhīraḥ sumukha eva ca // Saund_2.3 //
GK19asvsau2u:135: vapuṣmāṃśca na ca stabdho dakṣiṇo na ca nārjavaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:136: tejasvī na ca na kṣāntaḥ kartā ca na ca vismitaḥ // Saund_2.4 //
GK19asvsau2u:138: abhavad yo na vimukhastejasā ditsayaiva ca // Saund_2.5 //
GK19asvsau2u:140: rājyaṃ dīkṣāmiva vahan vṛttenānvagamat pitṝn // Saund_2.6 //
GK19asvsau2u:143: kṛtaśāstraḥ kṛtāstro vā jāto vā vipule kule /
GK19asvsau2u:144: akṛtārtho na dadṛśe yasya darśanameyivān // Saund_2.8 //
GK19asvsau2u:145: hitaṃ vipriyamapyukto yaḥ suśrāva na cukṣubhe /
GK19asvsau2u:146: duṣkṛtaṃ bahvapi tyaktvā sasmāra kṛtamaṇvapi // Saund_2.9 //
GK19asvsau2u:151: adhyaiṣṭa yaḥ paraṃ brahma na vyaiṣṭa satataṃ dhṛteḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:152: dānānyadita pātrebhyaḥ pāpaṃ nākṛta kiṃcana // Saund_2.12 //
GK19asvsau2u:156: vyarociṣṭa ca śiṣṭebhyo māsīṣe candramā iva // Saund_2.14 //
GK19asvsau2u:160: acaiṣīcca nayairbhūmiṃ bhūyasā yaśasaiva ca // Saund_2.16 //
GK19asvsau2u:170: āryabhāvācca nādhukṣad dviṣato 'pi sato guṇān // Saund_2.21 //
GK19asvsau2u:171: ākṛkṣad vapuṣā dṛṣṭīḥ prajānāṃ candramā iva /
GK19asvsau2u:173: nākrukṣad viṣaye tasya kaścitkaiścit kvacit kṣataḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:178: sthitaḥ kārtayuge dharme dharmāt kṛcchre 'pi nāsrasat // Saund_2.25 //
GK19asvsau2u:180: avartiṣṭa ca vṛddheṣu nāvṛtad garhite pathi // Saund_2.26 //
GK19asvsau2u:204: priya ityeva cāśaktaṃ na saṃrāgādavīvṛdhat // Saund_2.38 //
GK19asvsau2u:205: tejasā ca tviṣā caiva ripūn dṛptānabībhasat /
GK19asvsau2u:206: yaśodīpena dīptena pṛthivīṃ ca vyabībhasat // Saund_2.39 //
GK19asvsau2u:208: dravyaṃ mahadapi tyaktvā na caivākīrti kiñcana // Saund_2.40 //
GK19asvsau2u:210: jitvā dṛptānapi ripūnna tenākāri vismayaḥ // Saund_2.41 //
GK19asvsau2u:213: na tenādarśi viṣamaṃ kāryaṃ kvacana kiṃcana /
GK19asvsau2u:214: vipriyapriyayoḥ kṛtye na tenāgāmi nikriyāḥ // Saund_2.43 //
GK19asvsau2u:215: tenāpāyi yathākalpaṃ somaśca yaśa eva ca /
GK19asvsau2u:216: vedaścāmnāyi satataṃ vedokto dharma eva ca // Saund_2.44 //
GK19asvsau2u:218: aśakyaḥ śakyasāmantaḥ śākyarājaḥ sa śakravat // Saund_2.45 //
GK19asvsau2u:219: atha tasmin tathā kāle dharmakāmā divaukasaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:224: upapattiṃ praṇidadhe kule tasya mahīpateḥ // Saund_2.48 //
GK19asvsau2u:225: tasyā devī nṛdevasya māyā nāma tadābhavat /
GK19asvsau2u:229: taṃ vinidiśiśuḥ śrutvā svapnaṃ svapnavido dvijāḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:236: didīpe 'bhyadhikaṃ sūryaḥ śivaśca pavano vavau // Saund_2.54 //
GK19asvsau2u:240: babhrāje śāntayā lakṣmyā dharmo vigrahavāniva // Saund_2.56 //
GK19asvsau2u:242: nando nāma suto jajñe nityānandakaraḥ kule // Saund_2.57 //
GK19asvsau2u:244: vapuṣāgryeṇa yo nāma sundaropapadaṃ dadhe // Saund_2.58 //
GK19asvsau2u:246: aṅgavāniva cānaṅgaḥ sa babhau kāntayā śriyā // Saund_2.59 //
GK19asvsau2u:247: sa tau saṃvardhayāmāsa narendraḥ parayā mudā /
GK19asvsau2u:249: tasya kālena satputrau vavṛdhāte bhavāya tau /
GK19asvsau2u:254: kāmeṣvajasraṃ pramamāda nandaḥ sarvārthasiddhastu na saṃrarañja //
GK19asvsau2u:255: sa prekṣyaiva hi jīrṇamāturaṃ ca mṛtaṃ ca vimṛśan jagadanabhijñamārtacittaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:257: udvegādapunarbhave manaḥ praṇidhāya sa yayau śayitavarāṅganādanāsthaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:258: niśi nṛpatinilayanād vanagamanakṛtamanāḥ sarasa iva mathitanalināt kalahaṃsaḥ // Saund_2.65
GK19asvsau2u:259: saundarananda mahākāvye “rājavarṇana” nāma dvitīyaḥ sarga samāpta /
GK19asvsau2u:262: śrīmadabhayapranuraktajanaṃ sa vihāya niścitamanā vanaṃ yayau // Saund_3.1
GK19asvsau2u:264: prekṣya sa viṣayatṛṣākṛpaṇānanavasthitaṃ tapa iti nyavartata // Saund_3.2
GK19asvsau2u:267: sa vicārayan jagati kiṃ nu paramamiti taṃ tamāgamam /
GK19asvsau2u:268: niścayamanadhigataḥ parataḥ paramaṃ cacāra tapa eva duṣkaram // Saund_3.4
GK19asvsau2u:269: atha naiṣa mārga iti vīkṣya tadapi vipulaṃ jahau tapaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:276: harṣatulamagaman muditā vimukhī tu mārapariṣat pracukṣubhe // Saund_3.8 //
GK19asvsau2u:277: sanagā ca bhūḥ pravicacāla hutabahasakhaḥ śivo vavau /
GK19asvsau2u:278: nedurapi ca suradundubhayaḥ pravavarṣa cāmbudharavarjitaṃ nabhaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:284: śāntiriyamayamupāya iti pravibhāgaśaḥ paramidaṃ catuṣṭayam // Saund_3.12
GK19asvsau2u:288: krodhamadabhayataraṅgacalaṃ pratatāra lokamapi ca vyatārayat // Saund_3.14
GK19asvsau2u:289: sa vinīya kāśiṣu gayeṣu bahujanamatho girivraje /
GK19asvsau2u:290: pitryamapi paramakāruṇiko nagaraṃ yayāvanujighṛkṣayā tadā // Saund_3.15 //
GK19asvsau2u:292: sūryasadṛśavapurabhyudito vijahāra sūrya iva gautamastamaḥ // Saund_3.16
GK19asvsau2u:294: vastumatiśuci śivopavanaṃ sa dadarśa niḥspṛhatayā yathā vanam //
GK19asvsau2u:297: pratipūjayā na sa jaharṣa na ca śucamavajñayāgamat /
GK19asvsau2u:302: śeṣamapi ca janamaśrumukhaṃ vininīṣayā gaganamutpapāta ha // Saund_3.21 //
GK19asvsau2u:303: sa vicakrame divi bhuvīva punarupaviveśa tasthivān /
GK19asvsau2u:305: salile kṣitāviva cacāra jalamiva viveśa medinīm /
GK19asvsau2u:306: megha iva divi vavarṣa punaḥ punarajvalannava ivodito raviḥ // Saund_3.23
GK19asvsau2u:308: taptakanakasadṛśaprabhayā sa babhau pradīpta iva sandhyayā ghanaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:312: paurajanamapi ca tatpravaṇaṃ nijagāda dharmavinayaṃ vināyakaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:314: dharmamatulamadhigamya munermuṃnaye nanāma sa yato gurāviva // Saund_3.27
GK19asvsau2u:316: śākyatanayavṛṣabhāḥ kṛtino vṛṣabhā ivānalabhayāt pravavrajuḥ // Saund_3.28
GK19asvsau2u:320: kiṃ bata vipulaguṇaḥ kulajaḥ sadayaḥ sadā kimu munerupāsayā // Saund_3.30
GK19asvsau2u:324: naiva ca parayuvatīragamat paramaṃ hi tā dahanato 'pyamanyata //
GK19asvsau2u:325: anṛtaṃ jagāda na ca kaścidṛtamapi jajalpa nāpriyam /
GK19asvsau2u:326: ślakṣṇamapi ca na jagāvahitaṃ hitamapyuvāca na ca paiśunāca yat //
GK19asvsau2u:327: manasā lulobha na ca jātu paravasuṣu gṛddhamānasaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:328: kāmasukhamasukhato vimṛśan vijahāra tṛpta iva tatra sajjanaḥ // Saund_3.34
GK19asvsau2u:329: na parasya kaścidapaghātamapi ca saghṛṇo vyacintayat /
GK19asvsau2u:330: mātṛpitṛsutasuhṛtsadṛśaṃ sa dadarśa tatra hi parasparaṃ janaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:331: niyataṃ bhaviṣyati paratra bhavadapi ca bhūtamapyatho /
GK19asvsau2u:332: karmaphalamapi ca lokagatirniyateti darśanamavāpa sādhu ca // Saund_3.36
GK19asvsau2u:334: bhraṃśini śithilaguṇo 'pi yuge vijahāra tatra munisaṃśrayājjanaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:336: sarvamaśivamavagamya bhavaṃ bhavasaṃkṣayāya vavṛte na janmane //
GK19asvsau2u:338: strotasi hi vavṛtire bahavo rajasaṃstanutvamapi cakrire pare // Saund_3.39
GK19asvsau2u:340: tyāgāvinayaniyamābhirato vijahāra so 'pi na cacāla satpathāt // Saund_3.40
GK19asvsau2u:341: api ca svato 'pi parato 'pi na bhayamabhavanna daivataḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:342: tatra ca susukhasubhikṣaguṇairjahṛṣuḥ prajāḥ kṛtayuge manoriva //
GK19asvsau2u:343: iti muditamanāmayaṃ nirāpat kururaghupūrupuropamaṃ puraṃ tat /
GK19asvsau2u:344: abhavadabhayadaiśike maharṣau viharati tatra śivāya vītarāge // Saund_3.42
GK19asvsau2u:345: saundaranande mahākāvye “tathāgatavarṇana” nāma tṛtīya sarga samāpta /
GK19asvsau2u:346: caturthaḥ sargaḥ bhāryāyācitaka munau bruvāṇe 'pi tu tatra dharmaṃ dharmaṃ prati jñātiṣu cādṛteṣu
GK19asvsau2u:347: prāsādasaṃstho madanaikakāryaḥ priyāsahāyo vijahāra nandaḥ // Saund_4.1 //
GK19asvsau2u:348: sa cakravākyeva hi cakravākastayā sametaḥ priyayā priyārhaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:349: nācintayad vaiśramaṇaṃ na śakraṃ tatsthānahetoḥ kuta eva dharmam //
GK19asvsau2u:350: lakṣmyā ca rūpeṇa ca sundarīti stambhena garveṇa ca māninīti /
GK19asvsau2u:351: dīptyā ca mānena ca bhāminīti yāto babhāṣe trividhena nāmnā // Saund_4.3
GK19asvsau2u:353: bhūyo babhāse svakuloditena strīpadminī nandadivākareṇa // Saund_4.4 //
GK19asvsau2u:355: manuṣyaloke hi tadā babhūva sā sundarī strīṣu nareṣu nandaḥ // Saund_4.5
GK19asvsau2u:356: sā devatā nandanacāriṇīva kulasya nandījananaśca nandaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:357: atītya martyānanupetya devān sṛṣṭāvabhūtāmiva bhūtadhātrā // Saund_4.6 //
GK19asvsau2u:358: tāṃ sundarī cenna labheta nandaḥ sā vā niṣeveta na taṃ natabhrūḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:359: dvandvaṃ dhruvaṃ tadvikalaṃ na śobhetānyonyahīnāviva rātricandrau //
GK19asvsau2u:368: vibhūṣayāmāsa tataḥ priyāṃ sa siṣeviṣustāṃ na mṛjāvahārtham /
GK19asvsau2u:369: svenaiva rūpeṇa vibhūṣitā hi vibhūṣaṇānāmapi bhūṣaṇaṃ sā // Saund_4.12 //
GK19asvsau2u:370: dattvātha sā darpaṇamasya haste mamāgrato dhāraya tāvadenam /
GK19asvsau2u:371: viśeṣakaṃ yāvadahaṃ karomītyuvāca kāntaṃ sa ca taṃ babhāra // Saund_4.13
GK19asvsau2u:372: bhartustataḥ śmaśru nirīkṣamāṇā viśeṣakaṃ sāpi cakāra tādṛk /
GK19asvsau2u:373: niśvāsavātena ca darpaṇasya cikitsayitvā nijaghāna nandaḥ // Saund_4.14 //
GK19asvsau2u:374: sā tena ceṣṭālalitena bhartuḥ śāṭhyena cāntarmanasā jahāsa /
GK19asvsau2u:375: bhavecca ruṣṭā kila nāma tasmai lalāṭajihmāṃ bhṛkuṭiṃ cakāra // Saund_4.15
GK19asvsau2u:376: cikṣepa karṇotpalamasya cāṃse kareṇa savyena madālasena /
GK19asvsau2u:379: padbhyāṃ priyāyā nalinopabhābhyāṃ mūrdhnā bhayānnāma nanāma nandaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:380: sa muktapuṣponmiṣitena mūrdhnā tataḥ priyāyāḥ priyakṛd babhāse /
GK19asvsau2u:383: kathaṃ kṛto 'sīti jahāsa coccairmukhena sācīkṛtakuṇḍalena // Saund_4.19 //
GK19asvsau2u:385: tamālapatrārdratale kapole samāpayāmāsa viśeṣakaṃ tat // Saund_4.20 //
GK19asvsau2u:386: tasyā mukhaṃ tat satamālapatraṃ tāmrādharauṣṭhaṃ cikurāyatākṣam /
GK19asvsau2u:389: viśeṣakāvekṣaṇakekarākṣo laḍat priyāyā vadanaṃ dadarśa // Saund_4.22 //
GK19asvsau2u:391: nandaḥ priyāyā mukhamīkṣamāṇo bhūyaḥ priyānandakaro babhūva // Saund_4.23
GK19asvsau2u:392: vimānakalpe sa vimānagarbhe tatastathā caiva nananda nandaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:393: tathāgataścāgatabhaikṣakālo bhaikṣāya tasya praviveśa veśma // Saund_4.24
GK19asvsau2u:394: avāṅamukho niṣpraṇāyaśca tasthau bhrāturgṛhe 'nyasya gṛhe yathaiva /
GK19asvsau2u:397: ayojayat snānavidhiṃ tathānyā jagranthuranyāḥ surabhīḥ srajaśca //
GK19asvsau2u:398: tasmin gṛhe bharturataścarantyaḥ krīḍānurūpaṃ lalitaṃ niyogam /
GK19asvsau2u:399: kāścinna buddhaṃ dadṛśuryuvatyo buddhasya vaiṣā niyataṃ manīṣā //
GK19asvsau2u:400: kācit sthitā tatra tu harmyapṛṣṭhe gavākṣapakṣe praṇidhāya cakṣuḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:401: viniṣpatantaṃ sugataṃ dadarśa payodagarbhādiva dīptamarkam // Saund_4.28
GK19asvsau2u:402: sā gauravaṃ tatra vicārya bhartuḥ svayā ca bhaktyārhatayārhataśca /
GK19asvsau2u:403: nandasya tasthau purato vivakṣustadājñayā ceti tadācacakṣe // Saund_4.29
GK19asvsau2u:404: anugrahāyāsya janasya śaṅke gururgṛhaṃ no bhagavān praviṣṭaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:405: bhikṣāmalabdhvā giramāsanaṃ vā śūnyādaraṇyādiva yāti bhūyaḥ // Saund_4.30
GK19asvsau2u:406: śrutvā maharṣeḥ sa gṛhapraveśaṃ satkārahīnaṃ ca punaḥ prayāṇam /
GK19asvsau2u:408: kṛtvāñjaliṃ mūrdhani padmakalpaṃ tataḥ sa kāntāṃ gamanaṃ yayāce /
GK19asvsau2u:409: karttu gamiṣyāmi gurau praṇāmaṃ māmabhyanujñātumihārhasīti // Saund_4.32
GK19asvsau2u:410: sā vepamānā parisasvaje taṃ śālaṃ latā vātasamīriteva /
GK19asvsau2u:411: dadarśa cāśruplutalolanetrā dīrghe ca niśvasya vaco 'bhyuvāca //
GK19asvsau2u:413: gacchāryaputraihi ca śīghrameva viśeṣako yāvadayaṃ na śuṣkaḥ // Saund_4.34
GK19asvsau2u:414: sacedbhavestvaṃ khalu dīrghasūtro daṇḍaṃ mahāntaṃ tvayi pātayeyam /
GK19asvsau2u:415: muhurmuhustvāṃ śayitaṃ kucābhyāṃ vibodhayeyaṃ ca na cālapeyam //
GK19asvsau2u:419: evaṃ kariṣyāmi vimuñca caṇḍi yāvad gururdūragato na me saḥ // Saund_4.37
GK19asvsau2u:420: tataḥ stanodvartitatacandanābhyāṃ mukto bhujābhyāṃ na tu mānasena /
GK19asvsau2u:421: vihāya veṣaṃ madanānurūpaṃ satkārayogyaṃ sa vapurbabhāra // Saund_4.38 //
GK19asvsau2u:422: sā taṃ prayāntaṃ ramaṇaṃ pradadhyau pradhyānaśūnyasthitaniścalākṣī /
GK19asvsau2u:423: sthitoccakarṇā vyapaviddhaśaṣpā bhrāntaṃ mṛgam bhrāntamukhī mṛgīva //
GK19asvsau2u:424: didṛkṣayākṣiptamanā munestu nandaḥ prayāṇaṃ prati tatvare ca /
GK19asvsau2u:425: vivṛttadṛṣṭiśca śanairyayau tāṃ karīva paśyan sa laḍatkareṇum //
GK19asvsau2u:427: kākṣeṇa paśyan na tatarpa nandaḥ pibannivaikena jalaṃ kareṇa // Saund_4.41
GK19asvsau2u:428: taṃ gauravaṃ buddhagataṃ cakarṣa bhāryānurāgaḥ punarācakarṣa /
GK19asvsau2u:429: so 'niścayānnāpi yayau na tasthau turaṃstaraṃgeṣviva rājahaṃsaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:431: śrutvā tato nūpuranisvanaṃ sa punarlalambe hṛdaye gṛhītaḥ // Saund_4.43 //
GK19asvsau2u:432: sa kāmarāgeṇa nigṛhyamāṇo dharmānurāgeṇa ca kṛṣyamāṇaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:433: jagāma duḥkhena vivartyamānaḥ plavaḥ pratistrota ivāpagāyāḥ // Saund_4.44
GK19asvsau2u:434: tataḥ kramairdīrghatamaiḥ pracakrame kathaṃ nu yāto na gururbhavediti /
GK19asvsau2u:435: svajeya tāṃ caiva viśeṣakapriyāṃ kathaṃ priyāmārdraviśeṣakāmiti //
GK19asvsau2u:436: atha sa pathi dadarśa muktamānaṃ pitṛnagare 'pi tathā gatābhimānam /
GK19asvsau2u:438: saundarananda mahākāvye “bhāryāyācitaka” nāma caturtha sarga samāpta /
GK19asvsau2u:439: pañcamaḥ sargaḥ nandadīkṣā athāvatīryāśvarathadvipebhyaḥ śākyā yathāsvarddhigṛhītaveṣāḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:440: mahāpaṇebhyo vyavahāriṇaśca mahāmunau bhaktivaśāt praṇemuḥ // Saund_5.1 //
GK19asvsau2u:444: jagāma duḥkhena vigāhamāno jalāgame strota ivāpagāyāḥ // Saund_5.3 //
GK19asvsau2u:445: atho mahadbhiḥ pati saṃpatadbhiḥ saṃpūjyamānāya tathāgatāya /
GK19asvsau2u:446: karttuṃ praṇāmaṃ na śaśāka nandastenābhireme tu gurormahimnā // Saund_5.4
GK19asvsau2u:447: svaṃ cāvasaṅgaṃ pathi nirmumukṣurbhaktiṃ janasyānyamateśva rakṣan /
GK19asvsau2u:448: nandaṃ ca gehābhimukhaṃ jighṛkṣan mārgaṃ tato 'nyaṃ sugataḥ prapede //
GK19asvsau2u:449: tato viviktaṃ ca viviktacetāḥ sanmārgavin mārgamabhipratasthe /
GK19asvsau2u:450: gatvāgrataścāgryatamāya tasmai nāndīvimuktāya nanāma nandaḥ // Saund_5.6
GK19asvsau2u:455: tatsādhu sāhupriya mattpriyārtham tatrāstu bhikṣūttama bhaikṣakālaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:456: asau hi madhyaṃ nabhaso yiyāsuḥ kālaṃ pratismārayatīva sūryaḥ // Saund_5.9
GK19asvsau2u:458: tādṛṅ nimittaṃ sugataścakāra nāhārakṛtyaṃ sa yathā viveda // Saund_5.10 //
GK19asvsau2u:459: tataḥ sa kṛtvā munaye praṇāmaṃ gṛhaprayāṇāya matiṃ cakāra /
GK19asvsau2u:460: anugrahārthaṃ sugatastu tasmai pātraṃ dadau puraṣkarapatranetraḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:461: tataḥ sa loke dadataḥ phalārthaṃ pātrasya tasyāpratimasya pātram /
GK19asvsau2u:464: hastasthapātro 'pi gṛhaṃ yiyāsuḥ sasāra mārgānmunimīkṣamāṇaḥ // Saund_5.13
GK19asvsau2u:465: bhāryānurāgeṇa yadā gṛhaṃ sa pātraṃ gṛhītvāpi yiyāsureva /
GK19asvsau2u:467: nirmokṣabījaṃ hi dadarśa tasya jñānaṃ mṛdu kleśarajaśca tīvram /
GK19asvsau2u:468: kleśānukūlaṃ viṣayātmakaṃ ca nandaṃ yatastaṃ munirācakarṣa // Saund_5.15
GK19asvsau2u:473: nandaḥ sa ca pratyayaneyacetā yaṃ śiśriye tanmayatāmavāpa /
GK19asvsau2u:474: yasmādimaṃ tatra cakāra yannaṃ taṃ snehapaṅkān munirujjihīrṣan //
GK19asvsau2u:480: kareṇa cakrāṅkatalena mūrdhni pasparśa caivedamuvāca cainam // Saund_5.21
GK19asvsau2u:481: yāvanna hiṃsraḥ samupaiti kālaḥ śamāya tāvat kuru saumya buddhim /
GK19asvsau2u:482: sarvāsvavasthāsviha vartamānaṃ sarvābhisāreṇa nihanti mṛtyuḥ // Saund_5.22
GK19asvsau2u:484: havyairivāgneḥ pavaneritasya lokasya kāmairna hi tṛptirasti // Saund_5.23
GK19asvsau2u:487: hitasya vaktā pravaraḥ suhṛdbhyo dharmāya khedo guṇavān śramebhyaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:488: jñānāya kṛtyaṃ paramaṃ kriyābhyaḥ kimindriyāṇāmupagamya dāsyam //
GK19asvsau2u:491: jarāsamā nāstyamṛjā prajānāṃ vyādheḥ samo nāsti jagatyanarthaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:492: mṛtyoḥ samaṃ nāsti bhayaṃ pṛthivyāmetattrayaṃ khalvavaśena sevyam //
GK19asvsau2u:493: snehena kaścinna samo 'sti pāśaḥ sroto na tṛṣṇāsamamasti hāri /
GK19asvsau2u:494: rāgāgninā nāsti samastathāgnistaccet trayaṃ nāsti sukhaṃ ca te 'sti //
GK19asvsau2u:497: prajñāmayaṃ varma badhāna tasmānno kṣāntinighnasya hi śokabāṇāḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:499: yathauṣadhairhastagataiḥ savidyo na daśyate kaścana pannagena /
GK19asvsau2u:500: tathānapekṣo jitalokamoho na daśyate śokabhujaṃgamena // Saund_5.31 //
GK19asvsau2u:501: āsthāya yogaṃ parigamya tattvaṃ na trāsamāgacchati mṛtyukāle /
GK19asvsau2u:502: ābaddhavarmā sudhanuḥ kṛtāsro jigīṣayā śūra ivāhavasthaḥ // Saund_5.32 //
GK19asvsau2u:504: dhṛṣṭaṃ girāntarhṛdayena sīdaṃstatheti nandaḥ sugataṃ babhāṣe //
GK19asvsau2u:505: atha pramādācca tamujjihīrṣan matvāgamasyaiva ca pātrabhūtam /
GK19asvsau2u:508: śanaistatastaṃ samupetya nando na pravrajiṣyāmyahamityuvāca // Saund_5.35
GK19asvsau2u:509: śrutvātha nandasya manīṣitaṃ tad buddhāya vaidehamuniḥ śaśaṃsa /
GK19asvsau2u:510: saṃśrutya tasmādapi tasya bhāvaṃ mahāmunirnandamuvāca bhūyaḥ // Saund_5.36
GK19asvsau2u:512: jñātīṃśca dṛṣṭvā vratino gṛhasthān saṃvinna kiṃ te 'sti na vāsti cetaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:513: rājarṣayaste viditā na nūnaṃ vanāni ye śiśriyire hasantaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:514: niṣṭhīvya kāmānupaśāntikāmāḥ kāmeṣu naivaṃ kṛpaṇeṣu saktāḥ // Saund_5.38
GK19asvsau2u:515: bhūyaḥ samālokya gṛheṣu doṣān niśāmya tattyāgakṛtaṃ ca śarma /
GK19asvsau2u:516: naivāsti moktuṃ matirālayaṃ te deśaṃ mumūrṣoriva sopasargam // Saund_5.39
GK19asvsau2u:517: saṃsārakāntāraparāyaṇasya śive kathaṃ te pathi nārurukṣā /
GK19asvsau2u:518: āropyamāṇasya tameva mārgaṃ bhraṣṭasya sārthādiva sārthikasya //
GK19asvsau2u:519: yaḥ sarvato veśmani dahyamāne śayīta mohānna tato vyapeyāt /
GK19asvsau2u:520: kālāgninā vyādhijarāśikhena loke pradīpte sa bhavet pramattaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:521: praṇīyamānaśca yathā vadhāya matto hasecca pralapecca vadhyaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:522: mṛtyau tathā tiṣṭhati pāśahaste śocyaḥ pramādyan viparitacetāḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:523: yadā narendrāśca kuṭumbinaśca vihāya bandhūṃśca parigrahāṃśca /
GK19asvsau2u:524: yayuśca yāsyanti ca yānti caiva priyeṣvanityeṣu kuto 'nurodhaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:525: kiñcinna paśyāmi ratasya yatra tadanyabhāvena bhavenna duḥkham /
GK19asvsau2u:526: tasmāt kvacinna kṣamate prasaktiryadi kṣamastadvigamānna śokaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:527: tatsaumya lolaṃ parigamya lokaṃ māyopamaṃ citramivendrajālam /
GK19asvsau2u:528: priyābhidhānaṃ tyaja mohajālaṃ chettuṃ matiste yadi duḥkhajālam //
GK19asvsau2u:529: varaṃ hitodarkamāniṣṭamannaṃ na svādu yat syādahitānubaddham /
GK19asvsau2u:530: yasmādahaṃ tvāṃ viniyojayāmi śive śucau vartmani vipriye 'pi // Saund_5.46
GK19asvsau2u:532: tathojjihīrṣuḥ khalu rāgaśalyaṃ tattvāmavocaṃ paruṣaṃ hitāya // Saund_5.47
GK19asvsau2u:536: yāvadvayo yogavidhau samarthaṃ buddhiṃ kuru śreyasi tāvadeva // Saund_5.49
GK19asvsau2u:537: ityevamuktaḥ sa vināyakena hitaiṣiṇā kāruṇikena nandaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:538: kartāsmi sarvaṃ bhagavan vacaste tathā yathājñāpayasītyuvāca // Saund_5.50
GK19asvsau2u:541: atho nataṃ tasya mukhaṃ sabāṣpaṃ pravāsyamāneṣu śiroruheṣu /
GK19asvsau2u:544: pūrṇaḥ śaśī bahulapakṣagataḥ kṣapānte bālātapena pariṣikta ivāvabhāse //
GK19asvsau2u:545: saundarananda kāvye “nandadīkṣā” nāma pañcama sarga samāpta /
GK19asvsau2u:546: ṣaṣṭhaḥ sargaḥ bhāryāvilāpa tato hṛte bharttari gauraveṇa prītau hṛtāyāmaratau kṛtāyām /
GK19asvsau2u:547: tatraiva harmyopari vartamānā na sundarī saiva tadā babhāse // Saund_6.1
GK19asvsau2u:550: vilambahārā calayoktrakā sā tasmād vimānād vinatā cakāśe /
GK19asvsau2u:551: tapaḥ kṣayādapsarasāṃ vareva cyutaṃ vimānāt priyamīkṣamāṇā // Saund_6.3 //
GK19asvsau2u:553: cintācalākṣeṇa mukhena tasthau bharttāramanyatra viśaṅkamānā // Saund_6.4
GK19asvsau2u:556: athātra kācit pramadā sabāṣpāṃ tāṃ duḥkhitāṃ draṣṭumanīpsamānā /
GK19asvsau2u:557: prāsādasopānatalapraṇādaṃ cakāra padbhyāṃ sahasā rudantī // Saund_6.6 //
GK19asvsau2u:559: prītyāṃ prasaktaiva ca saṃjaharṣa priyopayānaṃ pariśaṅkamānā // Saund_6.7
GK19asvsau2u:561: sopānakukṣiṃ prasasāra harṣād bhraṣṭaṃ dukūlāntamacintayantī // Saund_6.8
GK19asvsau2u:562: tāmaṅganāṃ prekṣya ca vipralabdhā niśvasya bhūyaḥ śayanaṃ prapede /
GK19asvsau2u:563: vivarṇavaktrā na rarāja cāśu vivarṇacandreva himāgame dyauḥ // Saund_6.9
GK19asvsau2u:564: sā duḥkhitā bhartturadarśanena kāmena kopena ca dahyamānā /
GK19asvsau2u:565: kṛtvā kare vaktramupopaviṣṭā cintānadīṃ śokajalāṃ tatāra // Saund_6.10 //
GK19asvsau2u:566: tasyāḥ mukhaṃ padmasapatnabhūtaṃ pāṇau sthitaṃ pallavarāgatāmre /
GK19asvsau2u:567: chāyāmayasyāmbhasi paṅkajasya babhau nataṃ padmamivopariṣṭāt // Saund_6.11
GK19asvsau2u:568: sā strīsvabhāvena vicintya tattad dṛṣṭānurāge 'bhimukhe 'pi patyau /
GK19asvsau2u:570: eṣyāmyanāśyānaviśeṣakāyāṃ tvayīti kṛtvā mayi taṃ pratijñām /
GK19asvsau2u:571: kasmānnu hetordayitapratijñaḥ so 'dya priyo me vitathapratijñaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:574: ratipriyasya priyavartino me priyasya nūnaṃ hṛdaya viraktam /
GK19asvsau2u:575: tathāpi rāgo yadi tasya hi syān maccittarakṣī na sa nāgataḥ syāt //
GK19asvsau2u:576: rūpeṇa bhāvena ca madviśiṣṭā priyeṇa dṛṣṭā niyataṃ tato 'nyā /
GK19asvsau2u:577: tathā hi kṛtvā mayi moghasāntvaṃ lagnāṃ satiṃ māmāgamad vihāya //
GK19asvsau2u:578: bhaktiṃ sa buddhaṃ prati yāvavocattasya prayātuṃ mayi so 'padeśaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:579: munau prasādo yadi tasya hi syānmṛtyorivogrādanṛtād bibhīyāt // Saund_6.17
GK19asvsau2u:581: bibharti so 'nyasya janasya taṃ cennamo 'stu tasmai calasauhṛdāya //
GK19asvsau2u:582: necchanti yāḥ śokamavāptumevaṃ śraddhātumarhanti na tā narāṇām /
GK19asvsau2u:583: kva cānuvṛttirmayi sāsya pūrvaṃ tyāgaḥ kva cāyaṃ janavat kṣaṇena //
GK19asvsau2u:584: ityevamādi priyaviprayuktā priye 'nyadāśaṅkya ca sā jagāda /
GK19asvsau2u:585: saṃbhrāntamāruhya ca tadvimānaṃ tāṃ strī sabāṣpā giramityuvāca //
GK19asvsau2u:587: yastvāṃ priyo nābhyacarat kadācittamanyathā yāsyatikātarāsi // Saund_6.21
GK19asvsau2u:588: mā svāminaṃ svāmini doṣato gāḥ priyaṃ priyārhaṃ priyakāriṇaṃ tam /
GK19asvsau2u:589: na sa tvadanyāṃ pramadāmavaiti svacakravākyā iva cakravākaḥ // Saund_6.22
GK19asvsau2u:592: śrutvā tato bhartari tāṃ pravṛttiṃ savepathuḥ sā sahasotpapāt /
GK19asvsau2u:593: pragṛhya bāhū virurāva coccairhṛdīva digdhābhihata kareṇuḥ // Saund_6.24
GK19asvsau2u:596: sā padmarāgaṃ vasanaṃ vasānā padmānanā padmadalāyatākṣī /
GK19asvsau2u:597: padmā vipadmā patiteva lakṣmīḥ śuśoṣa padmasragivātapena // Saund_6.26 //
GK19asvsau2u:598: saṃcintya sacintya guṇāṃśca bharturdīrghaṃ niśaśvāsa tatāma caiva /
GK19asvsau2u:599: vibhūṣaṇaśrīnihite prakoṣṭhe tāmre karāgre ca vinirdudhāva // Saund_6.27
GK19asvsau2u:600: na bhūṣaṇārtho mama saṃpratīti sā dikṣu cikṣepa vibhūṣaṇāni /
GK19asvsau2u:601: nirbhūṣaṇā sā patitā cakāśe viśīrṇapuṣpastabakā lateva // Saund_6.28 //
GK19asvsau2u:603: yatnācca vinyastatamālapatrau ruṣṭeva dhṛṣṭaṃ pramamājaṃ gaṇḍau //
GK19asvsau2u:607: rukmāṅgapāde śayane mahārhe na śarma lebhe pariceṣṭamānā // Saund_6.31 //
GK19asvsau2u:608: sandṛśya bhartuśca vibhūṣaṇāni vāsāṃsi vīṇāprabhṛtīṃśca līlāḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:609: tamo viveśābhinanāda coccaiḥ paṅkāvatīrṇeva ca saṃsasāda // Saund_6.32 //
GK19asvsau2u:611: śokāgnināntarhṛdi dahyamānā vibhrāntacitteva tadā babhūva // Saund_6.33 //
GK19asvsau2u:612: ruroda mamlau virurāva jaglau babhrāma tasthau vilalāpa dadhyau /
GK19asvsau2u:613: cakāra roṣaṃ vicakāra mālyaṃ cakarta vaktraṃ vicakarṣa vastram //
GK19asvsau2u:614: tāṃ cārudantīṃ prasabhaṃ rudantīṃ saṃśrutya nāryaḥ paramābhitaptāḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:616: bāṣpeṇa tāḥ klinnaviṣaṇṇavaktrā varṣeṇa padminya ivārdrapadmāḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:620: yā tatra tāsāṃ vacasopapannā mānyā ca tasyā vayasādhikā ca /
GK19asvsau2u:621: sā pṛṣṭhatastāṃ tu samāliliṅge pramṛjya cāśrūṇi vacāṃsyuvāca // Saund_6.38
GK19asvsau2u:622: rājarṣivadhvāstava nānurūpo dharmāśrite bhartari jātu śokaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:624: prāyeṇa mokṣāya viniḥsṛtānāṃ śākyarṣabhāṇāṃ viditāḥ striyaste /
GK19asvsau2u:625: tapovanānīva gṛhāṇi yāsāṃ sādhvīvrataṃ kāmavadāśritānām // Saund_6.40 //
GK19asvsau2u:626: yadyanyayā rūpaguṇādhikatvād bharttā hṛtaste kuru bāṣpamokṣam /
GK19asvsau2u:627: manasvinī rūpavatī guṇāḍhyā hṛdi kṣate kātra hi nāśru muñcet // Saund_6.41
GK19asvsau2u:628: athāpi kiṃcid vyasanaṃ prapanno mā caiva tad bhūt sadṛśo 'tra bāṣpaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:629: ato viśiṣṭaṃ na hi duḥkhamasti kulodgatāyāḥ patidevatāyāḥ // Saund_6.42 //
GK19asvsau2u:630: atha tvidānīṃ laḍitaḥ sukhena svasthaḥ phalastho vyasanānyadṛṣṭvā /
GK19asvsau2u:631: vītaspṛho dharmamanuprapannaḥ kiṃ viklavā rodiṣi harṣakāle // Saund_6.43
GK19asvsau2u:632: ityevamuktāpi bahuprakāraṃ snehāttayā naiva dhṛtiṃ cakāra /
GK19asvsau2u:633: athāparā tāṃ manaso 'nukūlaṃ kālopapannaṃ praṇayāduvāca // Saund_6.44 //
GK19asvsau2u:634: bravīmi satyaṃ suviniścitaṃ me prāptaṃ priyaṃ drakṣyasi śīghrameva /
GK19asvsau2u:635: tvayā vinā sthāsyati tatra nāsau sattvāśrayaścetanayeva hīnaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:636: aṅke 'pi lakṣmyā na sa nirvṛtaḥ syāt tvaṃ tasya pārśve yadi tatra na syāḥ
GK19asvsau2u:637: āpatsu kṛcchrāsvapi cāgatāsu tvāṃ paśyatastasya bhavenna duḥkham //
GK19asvsau2u:638: tvaṃ nirvṛtiṃ gaccha niyaccha bāṣpaṃ taptāśrumokṣāt parirakṣa cakṣuḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:639: yastasya bhāvastvayi yaśca rāgo na raṃsyate tvadvirahāt sa dharme //
GK19asvsau2u:641: anātmanādāya gṛhonmukhasya punarvimoktuṃ ka ivāsti doṣaḥ // Saund_6.48 //
GK19asvsau2u:642: iti yuvatijanena sāntvyamānā hṛtahṛdayā ramaṇena sundarī sā /
GK19asvsau2u:644: saundarananda mahākāvye “bhāryāvilāpa” nāma ṣaṣṭha sarga samāpta /
GK19asvsau2u:645: saptamaḥ sargaḥ nandavilāpa liṅgaṃ tataḥ śāstṛvidhipradiṣṭaṃ gātreṇa bibhranna tu cetasā tat
GK19asvsau2u:646: bhāryāgataireva manovitarkairjehrīyamāṇo na nananda nandaḥ // Saund_7.1 //
GK19asvsau2u:647: sa puṣpamāsasya ca puṣpalakṣmyā sarvābhisāreṇa ca puṣpaketoḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:648: yānīyabhāvena ca yauvanasya vihārasaṃstho na śamaṃ jagāma // Saund_7.2 //
GK19asvsau2u:650: bhṛśaṃ jajṛmbhe yugadīrghabāhurdhyātvā priyāṃ cāpamivācakarṣa // Saund_7.3
GK19asvsau2u:652: dīrghaṃ niśaśvāsa vicintya bhāryāṃ navagraho nāga ivāvaruddhaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:653: śokasya hartā śaraṇāgatānāṃ śokasya karttā pratigarvitānām /
GK19asvsau2u:654: aśokamālambya sa jātaśokaḥ priyāṃ priyāśokakavanāṃ śuśoca // Saund_7.5 //
GK19asvsau2u:655: priyāṃ priyāyāḥ pratanuṃ priyaṅguṃ niśāmya bhītāmiva niṣpatantīm /
GK19asvsau2u:656: sasmāra tāmaśrumukhīṃ sabāṣpaḥ priyāṃ priyaṅguprasavāvadātām // Saund_7.6
GK19asvsau2u:659: latāṃ praphullāmatimuktakasya cūtasya pārśve parirabhya jātām /
GK19asvsau2u:660: niśāmya cintāmagamattadaivaṃ śliṣṭā bhavenmāmapi sundarīti // Saund_7.8 //
GK19asvsau2u:661: puṣpotkarālā api nāgavṛkṣā dāntaiḥ samudgairiva hemagarbhaiḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:662: kāntāravṛkṣā iva duḥkhitasya na cakṣurācikṣipurasya tatra // Saund_7.9 //
GK19asvsau2u:663: gandhaṃ vamanto 'pi ca gandhaparṇā gandharvaveśyā iva gandhapūrṇāḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:664: tasyānyacittasya śugātmakasya ghrāṇaṃ na janhurhṛdayaṃ pratepuḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:666: lelihyamānaiśca madhu dvirephaiḥ svanadvanaṃ tasya mano nunoda //
GK19asvsau2u:668: kāmāgnināntarhṛdi dahyamāno vihāya dhairyaṃ vilalāpa tattat // Saund_7.12
GK19asvsau2u:669: adyāvagacchāmi suduṣkaraṃ te cakruḥ kariṣyanti ca kurvate ca /
GK19asvsau2u:670: tyaktvā priyāmaśrumukhīṃ tapo ye cerūścariṣyanti caranti caiva //
GK19asvsau2u:671: tāvad dṛḍhaṃ bandhanamasti loke na dāravaṃ tāntavamāyasaṃ vā /
GK19asvsau2u:672: yāvad dṛḍhaṃ bandhanametadeva mukhaṃ calākṣaṃ lalitaṃ ca vākyam //
GK19asvsau2u:673: chittvā ca bhittvā ca hi yānti tāni svapauruṣāccaiva suhṛdbalācca /
GK19asvsau2u:674: jñānācca raukṣyācca vinā vimoktuṃ na śakyate snehamayastu pāśaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:675: jñānaṃ na me tacca śamāya yat syānna na cāsti raukṣyaṃ karuṇātmako 'smi /
GK19asvsau2u:677: ahaṃ gṛhītvāpi hi bhikṣuliṅgaṃ bhrātṝṣiṇā dviguruṇānuśiṣṭaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:678: sarvāsvavasthāsu labhe na śāntiṃ priyāviyogādiva cakravākaḥ // Saund_7.17
GK19asvsau2u:679: adyāpi tanme hṛdi vartate ca yaddarpaṇe vyākulite mayā sā /
GK19asvsau2u:682: pāriplavākṣeṇa mukhena bālā tanme vaco 'dyāpi mano ruṇaddhi // Saund_7.19
GK19asvsau2u:683: buddhvāsanaṃ parvatanirjharasthaḥ svastho yathā dhyāyati bhikṣureṣaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:684: saktaḥ kvacinnāhamivaiṣa nūnaṃ śāntastathā tṛpta ivopaviṣṭaḥ // Saund_7.20
GK19asvsau2u:686: śāstraṃ yathābhyasyati caiṣa yuktaḥ śaṅke priyākarṣati nāsya cetaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:689: nirīkṣamāṇasya jalaṃ sapadmaṃ vanaṃ ca phullaṃ parapuṣṭajuṣṭam /
GK19asvsau2u:690: kasyāsti dhairyaṃ navayauvanasya māse madhau dharmasapatnabhūte //
GK19asvsau2u:691: bhāvena garveṇa gatena lakṣmyā smitena kopena madena vāgbhiḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:693: kāmābhibhūto hi hiraṇyaretāḥ svāhāṃ siṣeve madhavānahalyām /
GK19asvsau2u:694: sattvena sargeṇa ca tena hīnaḥ strinirjitaḥ kiṃ bata mānuṣo 'ham //
GK19asvsau2u:695: sūryaḥ saraṇyūṃ prati jātarāgastatprītaye taṣṭa iti śrutaṃ naḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:698: bahūni varṣāṇi babhūva yuddhaṃ kaḥ strīnimittaṃ na caledihānyaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:699: bheje śvapākīṃ munirakṣamālāṃ kāmādvasiṣṭhaśca sa sadvariṣṭhaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:700: yasyāṃ vivaśvāniva bhūjalādaḥ sutaḥ prasūto 'sya kapiñjalādaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:702: suto 'sya yasyāṃ suṣuve mahātmā dvaipāyano vedavibhāgakarttā // Saund_7.29
GK19asvsau2u:703: dvaipāyano dharmaparāyaṇaśca reme samaṃ kāśiṣu veśyavadhvā /
GK19asvsau2u:704: yayā hato 'bhūccalanūpureṇa pādena vidyullatayeva meghaḥ // Saund_7.30 //
GK19asvsau2u:706: sārasvato yatra suto 'sya jajñe naṣṭasya vedasya punaḥpravaktā //
GK19asvsau2u:707: tathā nṛparṣerdilīpasya yajñe svargastriyāṃ kāśyapa āgatāsthaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:708: sruvaṃ gṛhītvā sravadātmatejaścikṣepa vahrāvasito yato 'bhūt // Saund_7.32
GK19asvsau2u:710: dhīmattaraṃ yatra rathītaraṃ sa sāraṅgajuṣṭaṃ janayāmbabhūva // Saund_7.33
GK19asvsau2u:711: niśāmya śāntāṃ naradevakanyāṃ vane 'pi śānte 'pi ca vartamānaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:712: cacāla dhairyānmuniṛṣyaśrṛṅgaḥ śailo mahīkampa ivoccaśrṛṅgaḥ // Saund_7.34
GK19asvsau2u:713: brahmarṣibhāvārthamapāsya rājyaṃ bheje vanaṃ yo viṣayeṣvanāsthaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:714: sa gādhijaścāpahṛto ghṛtācyā samā daśaikaṃ divasaṃ viveda // Saund_7.35 //
GK19asvsau2u:715: tathaiva kandarpaśarābhimṛṣṭo rambhāṃ prati sthūlaśirā mumūrccha /
GK19asvsau2u:718: saṃdṛśya saṃdṛśya jaghāna sarpān priyaṃ na roṣeṇa tapo rarakṣa //
GK19asvsau2u:721: rakto girermūrdhani menakāyāṃ kāmātmakatvācca sa tālajaṅghaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:722: pādena viśvāvasunā saroṣaṃ vajreṇa hintāla ivābhijaghne // Saund_7.39 //
GK19asvsau2u:724: janhuśca gaṅgāṃ nṛpatirbhujābhyāṃ rurodha maināka ivācalendraḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:727: hṛtāṃ ca saunandakinānu 'śocan prāptāmivorvīṃ striyamurvaśīṃ tām /
GK19asvsau2u:728: sadvṛttavarmā kila somavarmā babhrāma citodbhavabhinnavarmā // Saund_7.42
GK19asvsau2u:729: bhāryāṃ mṛtāṃ cānumamāra rājā bhīmaprabhāvo bhuvi bhīmakaḥ saḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:730: balena senāka iti prakāśaḥ senāpatirdeva ivāttasenaḥ // Saund_7.43 //
GK19asvsau2u:731: svargaṃ gate bhartari śantanau ca kālīṃ jihīrṣan janamejayaḥ saḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:732: avāpa bhīṣmāt samavetya mṛtyuṃ na tadgataṃ manmathamutsasarja //
GK19asvsau2u:734: jagāma mādrīṃ na maharṣiśāpādasevyasevī vimamarśa mṛtyum // Saund_7.45 //
GK19asvsau2u:735: evaṃvidhā devanṛparṣisaṅghāḥ strīṇāṃ vaśaṃ kāmavaśena jagmuḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:736: dhiyā ca sāreṇa ca durbalaḥ san priyāmapaśyan kimu viklavo 'ham //
GK19asvsau2u:737: yāsyāmi tasmād gṛhameva bhūyaḥ kāmaṃ kariṣye vidhivat sakāmam /
GK19asvsau2u:738: na hyanyacittasya calendriyasya liṅgaṃ kṣamaṃ dharmapathāccyutasya //
GK19asvsau2u:739: pāṇau kapālamavadhārya vidhāya mauṇḍyaṃ mānaṃ nidhāya vikṛtaṃ paridhāya vāsaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:740: yasyoddhavo na dhṛtirasti na śāntirasti citrapradīpa iva so 'sti ca nāsti caiva // Saund_7.48
GK19asvsau2u:741: yo niḥsṛtaśca na ca niḥsṛtakāmarāgaḥ kāṣāyamudvahati yo na ca niṣkaṣāyaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:742: pātraṃ bibharti ca guṇairna ca pātrabhūto liṅgaṃ vahannapi sa naiva gṛhī na bhikṣuḥ // Saund_7.49
GK19asvsau2u:743: na nyāyyamanvayavataḥ parigṛhya liṅgaṃ bhūyo vimoktumiti yo 'pi hi me vicāraḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:744: so 'pi praṇaśyati vicintya nṛpapravīrāstānye tapovanamapāsya gṛhāṇyatīyuḥ // Saund_7.50
GK19asvsau2u:745: śālbādhipo hi sasuto 'pi tathāmbarīṣo rāmo 'ndha eva sa ca
GK19asvsau2u:747: cīrāṇyapāsya dadhire punaraṃśukāni chittvā jaṭāśca kuṭilā mukuṭāni babhruḥ // Saund_7.51
GK19asvsau2u:748: tasmād bhikṣārthaṃ mama gururito yāvadeva prayātas tyaktvā kāṣāyaṃ ṛhamahamitastāvadeva prayāsye
GK19asvsau2u:749: pūjyaṃ liṅgaṃ hi skhalitamanaso bibhrataḥ kliṣṭabuddher nāmutrārthaḥ syādupahatamaternāpyayaṃ jīvalokaḥ // Saund_7.52 //
GK19asvsau2u:750: saundarananda mahākāvye “nandavilāpa” nāma saptama sarga samāpta /
GK19asvsau2u:751: aṣṭamaḥ sargaḥ strīvighna atha nandamadhīralocanaṃ gṛhayānotsukamutsukotsukam /
GK19asvsau2u:752: abhigamya śivena cakṣuṣā śramaṇaḥ kaściduvāca maitrayā // Saund_8.1 //
GK19asvsau2u:753: kimidaṃ mukhamaśrudurdinaṃ hṛdayasthaṃ vivṛṇoti te tamaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:754: dhṛtimehi niyaccha vikriyāṃ na hi bāṣpaśca śamaśca śobhate // Saund_8.2 //
GK19asvsau2u:755: dvividhā samudeti vedanā niyataṃ cetasi deha eva ca /
GK19asvsau2u:757: tadiyaṃ yadi kāyikī rujā bhiṣaje tūrṇamanūnamucyatām /
GK19asvsau2u:759: atha duḥkhamidaṃ manomayaṃ vada vakṣyāmi yadatra bheṣajam /
GK19asvsau2u:760: manaso hi rajastamasvino bhiṣajo 'dhyātmavidaḥ parīkṣakāḥ // Saund_8.5 //
GK19asvsau2u:761: nikhilena ca satyamucyatāṃ yadi vācyaṃ mayi saumya manyase /
GK19asvsau2u:762: gatayo vividhā hi cetasāṃ bahuguhyāni mahākulāni ca // Saund_8.6 //
GK19asvsau2u:763: iti tena sa coditastadā vyavasāyaṃ pravivakṣurātmanaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:764: avalambya kare kareṇa taṃ praviveśānyatarad vanāntaram // Saund_8.7 //
GK19asvsau2u:765: atha tatra śucau latāgṛhe kusumodgāriṇi tau niṣedatuḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:768: śrutavāgviśadāya bhikṣave viduṣā pravrajitena durvacam // Saund_8.9 //
GK19asvsau2u:769: sadṛśaṃ yadi dharmacāriṇaḥ satataṃ prāṇiṣu maitracetasaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:770: adhṛtau yadiyaṃ hitaiṣitā mayi te syāt karuṇātmanaḥ sataḥ // Saund_8.10 //
GK19asvsau2u:771: ata eva ca me viśeṣataḥ pravivakṣā kṣamavādini tvayi /
GK19asvsau2u:772: na hi bhāvamimaṃ calātmane kathayeyaṃ bruvate 'pyasādhave // Saund_8.11 //
GK19asvsau2u:773: tadidaṃ śrṛṇu me samāsato na rame dharmavidhāvṛte priyām /
GK19asvsau2u:774: girisānuṣu kāminīmṛte kṛtaretā iva kinnaraścaran // Saund_8.12 //
GK19asvsau2u:775: vanavāsasukhāt parāṅmukhaḥ prayiyāsā gṛhameva yena me /
GK19asvsau2u:776: na hi śarma labhe tayā binā nṛpatirhīna ivottamaśriyā // Saund_8.13 //
GK19asvsau2u:777: atha tasya niśamya tadvacaḥ priyabhāryābhimukhasya śocataḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:778: śramaṇaḥ sa śiraḥ prakampayannijagādātmagataṃ śanairidam // Saund_8.14 //
GK19asvsau2u:779: kṛpaṇaṃ bata yūthalālaso mahato vyādhabhayād viniḥsṛtaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:780: pravivikṣati vāgurāṃ mṛgaścapalo gītaraveṇa vañcitaḥ // Saund_8.15 //
GK19asvsau2u:781: vihagaḥ khalu jālasaṃvṛto hitakāmena janena mokṣitaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:782: vicaran phalapuṣpavadvanaṃ pravivikṣuḥ svayameva pañcaram // Saund_8.16 //
GK19asvsau2u:784: jalatarṣavaśena tāṃ punaḥ saritaṃ grāhavatīṃ titīrṣati // Saund_8.17 //
GK19asvsau2u:785: śaraṇe sabhujaṅgame svapan pratibuddhena pareṇa bodhitaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:786: taruṇaḥ khalu jātavibhramaḥ svayamugraṃ bhujagaṃ jighṛkṣati // Saund_8.18
GK19asvsau2u:788: punaricchati nīḍatṛṣṇayā patituṃ tatra gatavyatho dvijaḥ // Saund_8.19 //
GK19asvsau2u:789: avaśaḥ khalu kāmamūrcchayā priyayā śyenabhayād vinākṛtaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:790: na dhṛtiṃ samupaiti na hriyaṃ karuṇaṃ jīvati jīvajīvakaḥ // Saund_8.20 //
GK19asvsau2u:791: akṛtātmatayā tṛṣānvito ghṛṇayā caiva dhiyā ca varjitaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:792: aśanaṃ khalu vāntamātmanā kṛpaṇaḥ śvā punarattumicchati // Saund_8.21 //
GK19asvsau2u:794: śramaṇaḥ sa hitābhikāṅkṣayā guṇavad vākyamuvāca vipriyam // Saund_8.22 //
GK19asvsau2u:796: upapannamalabdhacakṣuṣo na ratiḥ śreyasi ced bhavettava // Saund_8.23 //
GK19asvsau2u:800: śamakarmasu yuktacetasaḥ kṛtabuddhena ratirna vidyate // Saund_8.25 //
GK19asvsau2u:801: ramate tṛṣito dhanaśriyā ramate kāmasukhena bāliśaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:802: ramate praśamena sajjanaḥ paribhogān paribhūya vidyayā // Saund_8.26 //
GK19asvsau2u:804: sadṛśī na gṛhāya cetanā praṇatirvāyuvaśad gireriva // Saund_8.27 //
GK19asvsau2u:806: upaśāntipathe śive sthitaḥ spṛhayeddoṣavate gṛhāya saḥ // Saund_8.28 //
GK19asvsau2u:807: vyasanābhihato yathā viśet parimuktaḥ punareva bandhanam /
GK19asvsau2u:808: samupetya vanaṃ tathā punargṛhasaṃjñaṃ mṛgayeta bandhanam // Saund_8.29 //
GK19asvsau2u:809: puruṣaśca vihāya yaḥ kaliṃ punaricchet kalimeva sevitum /
GK19asvsau2u:810: sa vihāya bhajeta bāliśaḥ kalibhūtāmajitendriyaḥ priyām // Saund_8.30 //
GK19asvsau2u:811: saviṣā iva saṃśritā latāḥ parimṛṣṭā iva soragā guhāḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:812: vivṛtā iva cāsayo dhṛtā vyasanāntā hi bhavanti yoṣitaḥ // Saund_8.31 //
GK19asvsau2u:813: pramadāḥ samadā madapradāḥ pramadā vitamadā bhayapradāḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:814: iti doṣabhayāvahāśca tāḥ kathamarhanti niṣevaṇaṃ nu tāḥ // Saund_8.32 //
GK19asvsau2u:815: svajanaḥ svajanena bhidyate suhadaścāpi suhṛjjanena yat /
GK19asvsau2u:818: praviśanti ca yaccamūmukhaṃ rabhasāstatra nimittamaṅganāḥ // Saund_8.34 //
GK19asvsau2u:819: vacanena haranti valgunā niśitena praharanti cetasā /
GK19asvsau2u:820: madhu tiṣṭhati vāci yoṣitāṃ hṛdaye hālahalaṃ mahadviṣaśam // Saund_8.35 //
GK19asvsau2u:821: pradahan dahano 'pi gṛhyate viśarīraḥ pavano 'pi gṛhyate /
GK19asvsau2u:822: kupito bhujago 'pi gṛhyate pramadānāṃ tu mano na gṛhyate // Saund_8.36 //
GK19asvsau2u:823: na vapurvimṛśanti na śriyaṃ na matiṃ nāpi kulaṃ na vikramam /
GK19asvsau2u:824: praharantyaviśeṣataḥ striyaḥ sarito grāhakulākulā iva // Saund_8.37 //
GK19asvsau2u:825: na vaco madhuraṃ na lālanaṃ smarati strī na ca sauhṛdaṃ kvacit /
GK19asvsau2u:826: kalitā vanitaiva cañcalā tadihāriṣviva nāvalambyate // Saund_8.38 //
GK19asvsau2u:827: adadatsu bhavanti narmadāḥ pradadatsu praviśanti vibhramam /
GK19asvsau2u:828: praṇateṣu bhavanti garvitāḥ pramadāstṛptatarāśca māniṣu // Saund_8.39 //
GK19asvsau2u:829: guṇavatsu caranti bhartṛvad guṇahīneṣu caranti putravat /
GK19asvsau2u:830: dhanavatsu caranti tṛṣṇayā dhanahīneṣu carantyavajñayā // Saund_8.40 //
GK19asvsau2u:831: viṣayād viṣayāntaraṃ gatā pracaratyeva yathā hṛtāpi gau /
GK19asvsau2u:834: api bibhrati caiva yantraṇā na tu bhāvena vahanti sauhṛdam // Saund_8.42
GK19asvsau2u:835: ramayanti patīn kathañcana pramadā yāḥ patidevatāḥ kvacit /
GK19asvsau2u:836: calacittatayā sahastraśo ramayante hṛdayaṃ svameva tāḥ // Saund_8.43 //
GK19asvsau2u:837: śvapacaṃ kila senajitsutā cakame mīnaripuṃ kumudvatī /
GK19asvsau2u:842: kathamarhati tāsu paṇḍito hṛdayaṃ sañjayituṃ calātmasu // Saund_8.46 //
GK19asvsau2u:843: atha sūkṣmamatidvayāśivaṃ laghu tāsāṃ hṛdayaṃ na paśyasi /
GK19asvsau2u:844: kimu kāyamasadgṛhaṃ sravad vanitānāmaśuciṃ na paśyasi // Saund_8.47 //
GK19asvsau2u:846: aśubhaṃ tamasāvṛtekṣaṇaḥ śubhato gacchasi nāvagacchasi // Saund_8.48 //
GK19asvsau2u:847: athavā samavaiṣi tattanūmaśubhāṃ tvaṃ na tu saṃvidasti te /
GK19asvsau2u:848: surabhiṃ vidadhāsi hi kriyāmaśucestatprabhavasya śāntaye // Saund_8.49 //
GK19asvsau2u:850: yadi sādhu kimatra yoṣitāṃ sahajaṃ tāsu vicīyatāṃ śuci // Saund_8.50 //
GK19asvsau2u:852: yadi sā tava sundarī bhavenniyataṃ te 'dya na sundarī bhavet // Saund_8.51
GK19asvsau2u:853: stravatīmaśuciṃ spṛśecca kaḥ saghṛṇo jarjarabhāṇḍavat striyam /
GK19asvsau2u:854: yadi kevalayā tvacāvṛtā na bhavenmakṣikapatramātrayā // Saund_8.52 //
GK19asvsau2u:856: madanena ca kṛṣyase balādaghṛṇaḥ khalvadhṛtiśca manmathaḥ // Saund_8.53 //
GK19asvsau2u:858: avicakṣaṇa kiṃ na paśyasi prakṛtiṃ ca prabhavaṃ ca yoṣitām // Saund_8.54
GK19asvsau2u:860: capalaṃ bhavanotsukaṃ manaḥ pratisaṃkhyānabalena vāryatām // Saund_8.55 //
GK19asvsau2u:861: śrutavān matimān kulodgataḥ paramasya praśamasya bhājanam /
GK19asvsau2u:862: upagamya yathā tathā punarna hi bhettuṃ niyamaṃ tvamarhasi // Saund_8.56
GK19asvsau2u:864: nidhanamapi varaṃ sthirātmanaścyutavinayasya na caiva jīvitam //
GK19asvsau2u:865: baddhvā yathā hi kavacaṃ pragṛhītacāpo, nindyo bhavatyapasṛtaḥ samarād
GK19asvsau2u:867: bhaikṣākamabhyupagataḥ parigṛhya liṅgaṃ, nindyastathā bhavati kāmahṛtendriyāśvaḥ // Saund_8.58
GK19asvsau2u:868: hāsyo yathā ca paramābharaṇāmbarastrag bhaikṣaṃ caran dhṛtadhanuścalacitramauliḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:869: vairūpyamabhyupagataḥ parapiṇḍabhojī hāsyastathā gṛhasukhābhimukhaḥ satṛṣṇaḥ // Saund_8.59
GK19asvsau2u:870: yathā svannaṃ bhuktvā paramaśayanīye 'pi śayito varāho nirmuktaḥ punaraśuci dhāvet paricitam
GK19asvsau2u:872: vanaṃ śāntaṃ hitvā gṛhamabhilaṣet kāmatṛṣitaḥ // Saund_8.60 //
GK19asvsau2u:873: yatholkā hastasthā dahati pavanapreritaśikhā yathā pādākrānto daśati bhujagaḥ krodharabhasaḥ
GK19asvsau2u:874: yathā hanti vyāghraḥ śiśurapi gṛhīto gṛhagataḥ tathā strīsaṃsargo bahuvidhamanarthāya bhavati tadvijñāya manaḥśarīraniyatānnārīṣu doṣānimān,
GK19asvsau2u:875: matvā kāmasukhaṃ nadījalacalaṃ kleśāya śokāya ca /
GK19asvsau2u:878: saundarananda mahākāvye “strīvighna” nāma aṣṭama sarga samāpta /
GK19asvsau2u:879: navamaḥ sargaḥ abhimānanindā athaivamukto 'pi sa tena bhikṣuṇā jagāma naivopaśamaṃ priyāṃ prati /
GK19asvsau2u:880: tathā hi tāmeva tadā sa cintayan na tasya śuśrāva visaṃjñavad vacaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:881: yathā hi vaidyasya cikīrṣataḥ śivaṃ vaco na gṛṇhāti mumūrṣurāturaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:882: tathaiva matto balarūpayauvanairhitaṃ na jagrāha sa tasya tadvacaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:883: na cātra citraṃ yadi rāgapāpmanā mano 'bhibhūyeta tamovṛtātmanaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:884: narasya pāpmā hi tadā nivartate yadā bhavatyantagataṃ tamastanu //
GK19asvsau2u:885: tatastathākṣiptamavekṣya taṃ tadā balena rūpeṇa ca yauvanena ca /
GK19asvsau2u:886: gṛhaprayāṇaṃ prati ca vyavasthitaṃ śaśāsa nandaṃ śramaṇaḥ sa śāntaye //
GK19asvsau2u:887: balaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca navaṃ ca yauvanaṃ tathāvagacchāmi yathāvagacchasi /
GK19asvsau2u:888: ahaṃ tvidaṃ te trayamavyavasthitaṃ yathāvabuddhye na tathāvabudhyase //
GK19asvsau2u:890: na vetsi dehaṃ jalaphenadurbalaṃ balasthatāmātmani yena manyase //
GK19asvsau2u:892: śarīramāsannavipatti dṛśyate bale 'bhimānastava kena hetunā // Saund_9.7
GK19asvsau2u:894: jalaṃ śucau māsa ivārkaraśmibhiḥ kṣayaṃ vrajan kiṃ baladṛpta manyase //
GK19asvsau2u:897: yathā ghaṭaṃ mṛnmayamāmamāśrito narastitīrṣet kṣubhitaṃ mahārṇavam /
GK19asvsau2u:899: śarīramāmādapi mṛnmayād ghaṭādidaṃ tu niḥsāratamaṃ mataṃ mama /
GK19asvsau2u:900: ciraṃ hi tiṣṭhed vidhivad dhṛto ghaṭaḥ samucchrayo 'yaṃ sudhṛto 'pi
GK19asvsau2u:902: yadāmbubhūvāyvanalāśca dhātavaḥ sadā viruddhā viṣamā ivoragāḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:903: bhavantyanarthāya śarīramāśritāḥ kathaṃ balaṃ rogavidho vyavasyasi //
GK19asvsau2u:904: prayānti mantraiḥ praśamaṃ bhujaṅgamā na mantrasādhyastu bhavanti dhātavaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:905: kvacicca kaṃcicca daśanti pannagāḥ sadā ca sarvaṃ ca tudanti dhātavaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:907: na marṣayatyekamapi vyatikramaṃ yato mahāśīviṣavat prakupyati //
GK19asvsau2u:908: yadā himārto jvalanaṃ niṣevate himaṃ nidādhābhihato 'bhikāṅkṣati /
GK19asvsau2u:909: kṣudhānvito 'nnaṃ salilaṃ tṛṣānvito balaṃ kutaḥ kiṃ ca kathaṃ ca kasya ca
GK19asvsau2u:913: cakarta bāhūn yudhi yasya bhārgavaḥ mahānti śrṛṅgāṇyaśanirgiretiva //
GK19asvsau2u:914: kva tad valaṃ kaṃsavikarṣiṇo haresturaṅgarājasya puṭāvabhedinaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:915: yamekabāṇena nijaghnivān jarāḥ kramāgatā rūpamivottamaṃ jarā // Saund_9.18
GK19asvsau2u:916: diteḥ sutasyāmararoṣakāriṇaścamūrucervā namuceḥ kva tad balam /
GK19asvsau2u:917: yamāhave kruddhamivāntakaṃ sthitaṃ jaghāna phenāvayavena vāsavaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:918: balaṃ kurūṇāṃ kva ca tattadābhavad yudhi jvalitvā tarasaujasā ca ye /
GK19asvsau2u:919: samitsamiddhā jvalanā ivādhvare hatāsavo bhasmani paryavasthitāḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:922: balaṃ mahad yadi vā na manyase kuruṣva yuddhaṃ saha tāvadindriyaiḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:923: jayaśca te 'trāsti mahacca te balaṃ parājayaśced vitathaṃ ca te balam //
GK19asvsau2u:924: tathā hi vīrāḥ puruṣā na te matā jayanti ye sāśvarathadvipānarīn yathā matā vīratarā manīṣiṇo jayanti lolāni ṣaḍindriyāṇi ye // Saund_9.23
GK19asvsau2u:925: ahaṃ vapuṣmāniti yacca manyase vicakṣaṇaṃ naitadidaṃ ca gṛhyatām /
GK19asvsau2u:926: kva tadvapuḥ sā ca vapuṣmatī tanurgadasya śāmbasya ca sāraṇasya ca //
GK19asvsau2u:927: yathā mayūraścalacitracandrako bibharti rūpaṃ guṇavat svabhāvataḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:928: śarīrasaṃskāraguṇādṛte tathā bibharti rūpaṃ yadi rūpavānasi // Saund_9.25
GK19asvsau2u:929: yadi pratīpaṃ vṛṇuyānna vāsasā na śaucakāle yadi saṃspṛśedapaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:930: mṛjāviśeṣaṃ yadi nādadīta vā vapurvapuṣman vada kīdṛśaṃ bhavet //
GK19asvsau2u:931: navaṃ vayaścātmagataṃ niśāmya yadgṛ honmukhaṃ te viṣayāptaye manaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:932: niyaccha tacchailanadīrayopamaṃ drutaṃ hi gacchatyanivarti yauvanam //
GK19asvsau2u:933: ṛturvyatītaḥ parivartate punaḥ kṣayaṃ prayātaḥ punareti candramāḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:934: gataṃ gataṃ naiva tu saṃnivartate jalaṃ nadīnāṃ ca nṛṇāṃ ca yauvanam //
GK19asvsau2u:936: yadā mukhaṃ drakṣyasi jarjaraṃ tadā jarābhibhūto vimado bhaviṣyasi //
GK19asvsau2u:937: niṣevya pānaṃ madanīyamuttamaṃ niśāvivāseṣu cirād vimādyati /
GK19asvsau2u:938: narastu matto balarūpayouvanairna kaścidaprāpya jarāṃ vimādyati //
GK19asvsau2u:940: tathā jarāyantranipīḍitā tanurnipītasārā maraṇāya tiṣṭhati // Saund_9.31
GK19asvsau2u:941: yathā hi nṛbhyāṃ karapatramīritaṃ samucchritaṃ dāru bhinattyanekadhā /
GK19asvsau2u:943: smṛteḥ pramoṣo vapuṣaḥ parābhavo rateḥ kṣayo vācchruticakṣuṣāṃ grahaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:944: śramasya yonirbalavīryayorvadho jarāsamo nāsti śarīriṇāṃ ripuḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:945: idaṃ viditvā nidhanasya daiśikaṃ jarābhidhānaṃ jagato mahadbhayam /
GK19asvsau2u:946: ahaṃ vapuṣmān balavān yuveti vā na mānamāroḍhumanāryamarhasi // Saund_9.34
GK19asvsau2u:947: ahaṃ mametyeva ca raktacetasāṃ śarīrasaṃjñā tava yaḥ kalau grahaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:948: tamutsṛjaivaṃ yadi śāmyatā bhaved bhayaṃ hyahaṃ ceti mameti cārchati //
GK19asvsau2u:949: yadā śarīre na vaśo 'sti kasyacinnirasyamāne vividhairupaplavaiḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:950: kathaṃ kṣamaṃ vettumahaṃ mameti vā śarīrasaṃjñaṃ gṛhamāpadāmidam //
GK19asvsau2u:951: sapannage yaḥ kugṛhe sadāśucau rameta nityaṃ pratisaṃskṛte 'bale /
GK19asvsau2u:952: sa duṣṭadhātāvaśucau calācale rameta kāye viparītadarśanaḥ // Saund_9.37
GK19asvsau2u:953: yathā prajābhyaḥ kunṛpo balād balīn haratyaśeṣaṃ ca na cābhirakṣati /
GK19asvsau2u:954: tathaiva kāyo vasanādisādhanaṃ haratyaśeṣaṃ ca na cānuvartate //
GK19asvsau2u:955: yathā prarohanti tṛṇānyayatnataḥ kṣitau prayatnāt tu bhavanti śālayaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:956: tathaiva duḥkhāni bhavantyayatnataḥ sukhāni yatnena bhavanti vā na vā //
GK19asvsau2u:957: śarīramārtaṃ parikarṣataścalaṃ na cāsti kiñcit paramārthataḥ sukham /
GK19asvsau2u:958: sukhaṃ hi duḥkhapratikārasevayā sthite ca duḥkhe tanuni vyavasyati //
GK19asvsau2u:960: tathānapekṣyātmani duḥkhamāgataṃ na vidyate kiñcana kasyacit sukhaṃ //
GK19asvsau2u:963: na kāmabhogā hi bhavanti tṛptaye havīṃṣi dīptasya vibhāvasoriva /
GK19asvsau2u:964: yathā yathā kāmasukheṣu vartate tathā tathecchā viṣayeṣu varddhate //
GK19asvsau2u:965: yathā ca kuṣṭhavyasanena duḥkhitaḥ pratāpanānnaiva śamaṃ nigacchati /
GK19asvsau2u:967: yathā hi bhaiṣajyasukhābhikāṅkṣayā bhajeta rogānna bhajeta tatkṣamam /
GK19asvsau2u:968: tathā śarīre bahuduḥkhabhājane rameta mohād viṣayābhikāṅkṣayā //
GK19asvsau2u:969: anarthakāmaḥ puruṣasya yo janaḥ sa tasya śatruḥ kila tena karmaṇā /
GK19asvsau2u:970: anarthamūlā viṣayāśca kevalā nanu praheyā viṣamā yathārayaḥ // Saund_9.46
GK19asvsau2u:971: ihaiva bhūtvā ripavo vadhātmakāḥ prayānti kāle puruṣasya mitratāṃ /
GK19asvsau2u:972: paratra caiveha ca duḥkhahetavo bhavanti kāmā na tu kasyacicchivāḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:973: yathopayuktaṃ rasavarṇagandhavad vadhāya kimpākaphalaṃ na puṣṭaye /
GK19asvsau2u:974: niṣevyamāṇā viṣayāścalātmano bhavantyanarthāya tathā na bhūtaye //
GK19asvsau2u:976: juṣasva me sajjanasaṃmataṃ mataṃ pracakṣva vā niścayamud giran giram //
GK19asvsau2u:977: iti hitamapi bahvapīdamuktaḥ śrutamahatā śramaṇena tena nandaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:978: na dhṛtimupayayau na śarma lebhe dvirada ivātimado madāndhacetāḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:979: nandasya bhāvamavagamya tataḥ sa bhikṣuḥ pāriplavaṃ gṛhasukhābhimukhaṃ na dharme /
GK19asvsau2u:981: saundarananda mahākāvye “abhimānanindā” nāma navama sarga samāpta /
GK19asvsau2u:982: daśamaḥ sargaḥ svargadarśana śrutvā tataḥ sadvratamutsisṛkṣuṃ bhāryāṃ didṛkṣuṃ bhavanaṃ vivikṣum
GK19asvsau2u:985: sa hrīmate hrīvinato jagāda svaṃ niścayaṃ niścayakovidāya // Saund_10.2 //
GK19asvsau2u:986: nandaṃ viditvā sugatastatastaṃ bhāryābhidhāne tamasi bhramantam /
GK19asvsau2u:987: pāṇau gṛhītvā viyadutpapāta malaṃ jale sādhurivojjihīrṣuḥ // Saund_10.3 //
GK19asvsau2u:993: agamyapārasya nirāśrayasya tau tasthaturdvīpa ivāmbarasya // Saund_10.6 //
GK19asvsau2u:994: śāntendriye tatra munau sthite tu savismayaṃ dikṣu dadarśa nandaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:995: darīśca kuñjāṃśca vanaukasaśca vibhūṣaṇaṃ rakṣaṇameva cādreḥ // Saund_10.7
GK19asvsau2u:996: bahvāyate tatra site hi śṛṅge saṃkṣiptabarhaḥ śayito mayūraḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1001: babhau gireḥ prasravaṇa pipāsurditsan pitṛbhyo 'mbha ivāvatīrṇaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:1002: calatkadambe himavannitambe tarau pralambe camaro lalambe /
GK19asvsau2u:1003: chettuṃ vilagnaṃ na śaśāka bālaṃ kulodgatāṃ prītimivāryavṛttaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:1007: vṛndāni rejurdiśi kinnarīṇāṃ puṣpotkacānāmiva vallarīṇām // Saund_10.13 //
GK19asvsau2u:1012: kā nanda rūpeṇa ca ceṣṭayā ca saṃpaśyataścārutarā matā te /
GK19asvsau2u:1013: eṣā mṛgī vaikavipannadṛṣṭiḥ sa vā jano yatra gatā taveṣṭiḥ // Saund_10.16
GK19asvsau2u:1014: ityevamuktaḥ sugatena nandaḥ kṛtvā smitaṃ kiṃcididaṃ jagāda /
GK19asvsau2u:1015: kva cottamastrī bhagavan vadhūste mṛgī nagakleśakarī kva caiṣā //
GK19asvsau2u:1016: tato munistasya niśamya vākyaṃ hetvantaraṃ kiṃcidavekṣamāṇaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1017: ālambya nandaṃ prayayau tathaiva krīḍāvanaṃ vajradharasya rājñaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:1018: ṛtāvṛtāvākṛtimeka eke kṣaṇe kṣaṇe bibhrati yatra vṛkṣāḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1019: citrāṃ samastāmapi kecidanye ṣaṇṇāmṛtūnāṃ śriyamudvahanti // Saund_10.19
GK19asvsau2u:1020: puṣyanti kecit surabhīrudārā mālāḥ srajaśca granthitā vicitrāḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1022: raktāni phullāḥ kamalāni yatra pradīpavṛkṣā iva bhānti vṛkṣāḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1025: atāntavānyekaghanāni yatra sūkṣmāṇi vāsāṃsi phalanti vṛkṣāḥ // Saund_10.22
GK19asvsau2u:1027: evaṃvidhānyābharaṇāni yatra svargānurūpāṇi phalanti vṛkṣāḥ // Saund_10.23
GK19asvsau2u:1030: yatrāyatāṃścaiva tatāṃśca tāṃstān vādyasya hetūn suṣirān ghanāṃśca /
GK19asvsau2u:1033: ākramya māhātmyaguṇairvirājan rājāyate yatra sa pārijātaḥ // Saund_10.26
GK19asvsau2u:1035: evaṃvidhā yatra sadānuvṛttā divaukasāṃ bhogavidhānavṛkṣāḥ // Saund_10.27
GK19asvsau2u:1047: manāṃsi khinnāni tapodhanānāṃ haranti yatrāpsaraso laḍantyaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:1048: nityotsavaṃ taṃ ca niśāmya lokaṃ nistandrinidrāratiśokarogam /
GK19asvsau2u:1049: nando jarāmṛtyuvaśaṃ sadārtaṃ mene śmaśānapratimaṃ nṛlokam // Saund_10.34
GK19asvsau2u:1050: aindraṃ vanaṃ tacca dadarśa nandaḥ samantato vismayaphulladṛṣṭiḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1052: sadā yuvatyo madanaikakāryāḥ sādhāraṇāḥ puṇyakṛtāṃ vihārāḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1058: tāḥ niḥsṛtāḥ prekṣya vanāntarebhyastaḍitpatākā iva toyadebhyaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1059: nandasya rāgeṇa tanurvivepe jale cale candramasaḥ prabheva // Saund_10.39
GK19asvsau2u:1060: vapuśca divyaṃ lalitāśca ceṣṭāstataḥ sa tāsāṃ manasā jahāra /
GK19asvsau2u:1061: kautūhalāvarjitayā ca dṛṣṭyā saṃśleṣatarṣādiva jātarāgaḥ // Saund_10.40 //
GK19asvsau2u:1063: lolendriyāśvena manorathena jehrīyamāṇo na dhṛtiṃ cakāra // Saund_10.41 //
GK19asvsau2u:1064: yathā manuṣyo malinaṃ hi vāsaḥ kṣāreṇa bhūyo malinīkaroti /
GK19asvsau2u:1066: doṣāṃśca kāyād bhiṣagujjihīrṣurbhūyo yathā kleśayituṃ yateta /
GK19asvsau2u:1067: rāgaṃ tathā tasya munirjighāṃsurbhūyastaraṃ rāgamupānināya // Saund_10.43
GK19asvsau2u:1070: mahacca rūpaṃ svaṇu hanti rūpaṃ śabdo mahān hanti ca śabdamalpam /
GK19asvsau2u:1071: gurvī rujā hanti rujāṃ ca mṛdvīṃ sarvo mahān heturaṇorvadhāya //
GK19asvsau2u:1073: avītarāgasya hi durbalasya mano dahedapsarasāṃ vapuḥśrīḥ // Saund_10.46 //
GK19asvsau2u:1075: rāgeṇa rāgaṃ pratihantukāmo munirvirāgo giramityuvāca // Saund_10.47 //
GK19asvsau2u:1076: etāḥ striyaḥ paśya divaukasastvaṃ nirīkṣya ca brūhi yathārthatattvam /
GK19asvsau2u:1077: etāḥ kathaṃ rūpaguṇairmatāste sa vā jano yatra gataṃ manaste //
GK19asvsau2u:1081: tadantare 'sau kṛpaṇā vadhūste vapuṣmatīrapsarasaḥ pratītya // Saund_10.50
GK19asvsau2u:1082: āsthā yathā pūrvamabhūnna kācidanyāsu me strīṣu niśāmya bhāryām /
GK19asvsau2u:1083: tasyāṃ tataḥsamprati kācidāsthā na me niśāmyaiva hi rūpamāsām //
GK19asvsau2u:1084: yathā pratapto mṛdunātapena dahyeta kaścin mahatānalena /
GK19asvsau2u:1085: rāgeṇa pūrvaṃ mṛdunābhitapto rāgāgninānena tathābhidahye // Saund_10.52 //
GK19asvsau2u:1086: vāgvāriṇāṃ māṃ pariṣiñca tasmādyāvanna dahye sa ivābjaśatruḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1087: rāgāgniradyaiva hiṃ māṃ didhakṣuḥ kakṣaṃ savṛkṣāgramivotthito 'gniḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:1088: prasīda sīdāmi vimuñca mā mune vasundharādhairya na dhairyamasti me /
GK19asvsau2u:1089: asūn vimokṣyāmi vimuktamānasa prayaccha vā vāgamṛtaṃ mumūrṣave //
GK19asvsau2u:1091: ahaṃ hi daṣṭo hṛdi manmathāhinā vidhatsva tasmādagadaṃ mahābhiṣak //
GK19asvsau2u:1092: anena daṣṭo madanāhināhinā na kaścidātmanyanavasthitaḥ sthitaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1093: mumoha bodhyorhyacalātmano mano babhūva dhīmāṃśca sa śantanustanuḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:1094: sthite viśiṣṭe tvayi saṃśraye śraye yathā na yāmīha vasan diśaṃ diśam /
GK19asvsau2u:1095: yathā ca labdhvā vyasanakṣayaṃ kṣayaṃ vrajāmi tanme kuru śaṃsataḥ sataḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:1096: tato jighāṃsurhṛdi tasya tattamastamonudo naktamivotthitaṃ tamaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1098: dhṛtiṃ pariṣvajya vidhūya vikriyāṃ nigṛhya tāvacchrutacetasī śṛṇu /
GK19asvsau2u:1099: imā yadi prārthayase tvamaṅganā vidhatsva śuklārthamihottamaṃ tapaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:1100: imā hi śakyā na balānna sevayā na saṃpradānena na rūpavattayā /
GK19asvsau2u:1101: imā hriyante khalu dharmacaryayā sacet praharṣaścara dharmamādṛtaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:1102: ihādhivāso divi daivataiḥ samaṃ vanāni ramyāṇyajarāśca yoṣitaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1103: idaṃ phalaṃ svasya śubhasya karmaṇo na dattamanyena na cāpyahetutaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:1104: kṣitau manuṣyo dhanurādibhiḥ śramaiḥ striyaḥ kadāciddhi labheta vā na vā /
GK19asvsau2u:1105: asaṃśayaṃ yattviha dharmacaryayā bhaveyuretā divi puṇyakarmaṇaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:1107: ahaṃ ca te 'tra pratibhūḥ sthire vrate yathā tvamābhiniyataṃ sameṣyasi //
GK19asvsau2u:1108: ataḥparaṃ paramamiti vyavasthitaḥ parāṃ dhṛtiṃ paramamunau cakāra saḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1109: tato muniḥ pavana ivāmbarāt patan pragṛhya taṃ punaragamanmahītalam //
GK19asvsau2u:1110: saundarananda mahākāvye “svargadarśana” nāma daśama sarga samāpta /
GK19asvsau2u:1111: ekādaśaḥ sargaḥ svarga kī hīnatā tatastā yoṣito dṛṣṭvā nando nandanacāriṇīḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1112: babandha niyamastambhe durdamaṃ capalaṃ manaḥ // Saund_11.1 //
GK19asvsau2u:1114: cacāra viraso dharmaṃ niveśyāpsaraso hṛdi // Saund_11.2 //
GK19asvsau2u:1119: saṃvṛtena ca śāntena tīvreṇa madanena ca /
GK19asvsau2u:1120: jalāgneriva saṃsargācchaśāma ca śuśoṣa ca // Saund_11.5 //
GK19asvsau2u:1124: vītarāga ivātasthau na jaharṣa na cukṣubhe // Saund_11.7 //
GK19asvsau2u:1128: nigṛhītendriyaḥ svastho niyame yadi saṃsthitaḥ // Saund_11.9 //
GK19asvsau2u:1132: prabalaḥ prabalaireva yatnairnaśyati vā na vā // Saund_11.11 //
GK19asvsau2u:1134: vinivṛtto yadi [ca] te sarvathā dhṛtimānasi // Saund_11.12 //
GK19asvsau2u:1136: atisargaśca lubdhena brahmacaryaṃ ca rāgiṇā // Saund_11.13 //
GK19asvsau2u:1140: rūkṣamapyāśaye śuddhe rukṣato naiti sajjanaḥ // Saund_11.15 //
GK19asvsau2u:1142: durlabhaṃ tu priyahitaṃ svādu pathyamivauṣadham // Saund_11.16 //
GK19asvsau2u:1146: tvacchreyo hi vivakṣā me yato nārhāmyupekṣitum // Saund_11.18 //
GK19asvsau2u:1156: yajjñātvā tvayi jātaṃ me hāsyaṃ kāruṇyameva ca // Saund_11.23 //
GK19asvsau2u:1157: yathāsanārthaṃ skandhena kaścid gurvīṃ śilāṃ vahet /
GK19asvsau2u:1162: dharmacaryā tava tathā paṇyabhūtā na śāntaye // Saund_11.26 //
GK19asvsau2u:1169: hṛdi kāmāgninā dīpte kāyena vahato vratam /
GK19asvsau2u:1172: prāptāstyaktāśca śataśastābhyaḥ kimiti te spṛhā // Saund_11.31 //
GK19asvsau2u:1174: nāpi kāmaiḥ satṛṣṇasya tasmāt kāmā na tṛṣtaye // Saund_11.32 //
GK19asvsau2u:1175: atṛptau sa kutaḥ śāntiraśāntau ca kutaḥ sukham /
GK19asvsau2u:1176: asukhe ca kutaḥ prītiraprītau ca kuto ratiḥ // Saund_11.33 //
GK19asvsau2u:1177: riraṃsā yadi te tasmādadhyātme dhīyatāṃ manaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1178: praśāntā cānavadyā ca nāstyadhyātmasamā ratiḥ // Saund_11.34 //
GK19asvsau2u:1179: na tatra kāryaṃ tūryaiste na strībhirna vibhūṣaṇaiḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1181: mānasaṃ balavad duḥkhaṃ tarṣe tiṣṭhati tiṣṭhati /
GK19asvsau2u:1182: taṃ tarṣaṃ chindhi duḥkhaṃ hi tṛṣṇā cāsti ca nāsti ca // Saund_11.36 //
GK19asvsau2u:1183: saṃpattau vā vipattau vā divā vā naktameva vā /
GK19asvsau2u:1184: kāmeṣu hi satṛṣṇasya na śāntirupapadyate // Saund_11.37 //
GK19asvsau2u:1185: kāmānāṃ prārthanā duḥkhā prāptau tṛptirna vidyate /
GK19asvsau2u:1186: viyogānniyataḥ śoko viyogaśca dhruvo divi // Saund_11.38 //
GK19asvsau2u:1187: kṛtvāpi duṣkaraṃ karma svarge labdhvāpi durlabham /
GK19asvsau2u:1188: nṛlokaṃ punarevaiti pravāsāt svagṛhaṃ yathā // Saund_11.39 //
GK19asvsau2u:1189: yadā bhraṣṭasya kuśalaṃ śiṣṭaṃ kiṃcinna vidyate /
GK19asvsau2u:1190: tiryakṣu pitṛloke vā narake copapadyate // Saund_11.40 //
GK19asvsau2u:1192: bhraṣṭasyārtasya duḥkhena kimāsvādaḥ karoti saḥ // Saund_11.41 //
GK19asvsau2u:1194: śiviḥ svargāt paribhraṣṭastādṛk kṛtvāpi duṣkaram // Saund_11.42 //
GK19asvsau2u:1196: sa devatvaṃ gataḥ kāle māndhātādhaḥ punaryayau // Saund_11.43 //
GK19asvsau2u:1197: rājyaṃ kṛtvāpi devānāṃ papāta nahuṣo bhuvi /
GK19asvsau2u:1198: prāptaḥ kila bhujaṃgatvaṃ nādyāpi parimucyate // Saund_11.44 //
GK19asvsau2u:1200: svargaṃ gatvā punarbhraṣṭaḥ kūrmībhūtaḥ kilārṇave // Saund_11.45 //
GK19asvsau2u:1201: bhūridyumno yayātiśca te cānye ca nṛparṣabhāḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1204: śriyaṃ samanuśocantaḥ pātālaṃ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ // Saund_11.47 //
GK19asvsau2u:1206: mahendrāḥ śataśaḥ peturmāhātmyamapi na sthiram // Saund_11.48 //
GK19asvsau2u:1209: hā caitraratha hā vāpi hā mandākini hā priye /
GK19asvsau2u:1210: ityārtā vilapanto 'pi gāṃ patanti divaukasaḥ // Saund_11.50 //
GK19asvsau2u:1212: kiṃ punaḥ patatāṃ svargādevānte sukhasevinām // Saund_11.51 //
GK19asvsau2u:1213: rajo gṛṇhanti vāsāṃsi mlāyanti paramāḥ srajaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1214: gātrebhyo jāyate svedo ratirbhavati nāsane // Saund_11.52 //
GK19asvsau2u:1218: yacca duḥkhaṃ nipatatāṃ duḥkhameva viśiṣyate // Saund_11.54 //
GK19asvsau2u:1220: vijñāya kṣayiṇaṃ svargamapavarge matiṃ kuru // Saund_11.55 //
GK19asvsau2u:1226: ko nāma svargavāsaya kṣeṣṇave spṛhayed budhaḥ // Saund_11.58 //
GK19asvsau2u:1227: sūtreṇa baddho hi yathā vihaṃgo vyāvartate dūragato 'pi bhūyaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1228: ajñānasūtreṇa tathāvabaddho gato 'pi dūraṃ punareti lokaḥ // Saund_11.59
GK19asvsau2u:1229: kṛtvā kālavilakṣaṇaṃ pratibhuvā mukto yathā bandhanād bhuktvā veśmasukhānyatītya samayaṃ bhūyo viśed vandhanaṃ /
GK19asvsau2u:1230: tadvad dyāṃ pratibhūvadātmaniyamairdhyānādibhiḥ prāptavān kāle karmasu teṣu bhuktaviṣayeṣvākṛṣate gāṃ punaḥ // Saund_11.60 //
GK19asvsau2u:1231: antarjālagatāḥ pramattamanaso mīnāstaḍāge yathā jānanti vyasanaṃ na rodhajanitaṃ svasthāścarantyambhasi
GK19asvsau2u:1232_0: antarlokagatāḥ kṛtārthamatayastadvaddivi dhyāyino manyante śivamacyutaṃ dhruvamiti svaṃ sthānamāvartakam tajjanmavyādhimṛtyuvyasanaparigataṃ
GK19asvsau2u:1232_1: matvā jagadidaṃ saṃsāre bhrāmyamāṇaṃ divi nṛṣu narake tiryakpitṛṣu ca /
GK19asvsau2u:1233: yattrāṇaṃ nirbhayaṃ yacchivamamarajaraṃ niḥśokamamṛtaṃ taddhetorbrahmacaryaṃ cara jahi hi calaṃ svargaṃ prati rucim //
GK19asvsau2u:1234: saundarananda mahākāvye “svarga kī hīnatā” nāma ekādaśa sarga samāpta //
GK19asvsau2u:1235: dvādaśaḥ sargaḥ viveka apsarobhṛtako dharmaṃ carasītyatha coditaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1236: ānandena tadā nandaḥ paraṃ vrīḍamupāgamat // Saund_12.1 //
GK19asvsau2u:1237: tasya vrīḍena mahatā pramodo hṛdi nābhavat /
GK19asvsau2u:1238: aprāmodyena vimukhaṃ nāvatasthe vrate manaḥ // Saund_12.2 //
GK19asvsau2u:1240: paripākagate hetau na sa tanmamṛṣe vacaḥ // Saund_12.3 //
GK19asvsau2u:1242: tasmāt kṣeṣṇuṃ pariśrutya bhṛśaṃ saṃvegameyivān // Saund_12.4 //
GK19asvsau2u:1251: babhūva sa hi saṃvegaḥ śreyasastasya vṛddhaye /
GK19asvsau2u:1254: triṣu kāleṣu sarveṣu nipāto 'stiriva smṛtaḥ // Saund_12.10 //
GK19asvsau2u:1261: śrutvā hyāvartakaṃ svargaṃ saṃsārastha ca citratām /
GK19asvsau2u:1262: na martyeṣu na deveṣu pravṛttirmama rocate // Saund_12.14 //
GK19asvsau2u:1263: yadi prāpya divaṃ yatnānniyamena damena ca /
GK19asvsau2u:1264: avitṛptāḥ patantyante svargāya tyāgine namaḥ // Saund_12.15 //
GK19asvsau2u:1268: yacchrutvā śṛṇvatāṃ śreṣṭha paramaṃ prāpnuyāṃ padam // Saund_12.17 //
GK19asvsau2u:1275: adya te saphalaṃ janma lābho 'dya sumahāṃstava /
GK19asvsau2u:1279: duḥkhaṃ na syāt sukhaṃ me syāditi prayatate janaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1280: atyantaduḥkhoparamaṃ sukhaṃ tacca na budhyate // Saund_12.23 //
GK19asvsau2u:1282: kāmādiṣu jagat saktaṃ na vetti sukhamavyayam // Saund_12.24 //
GK19asvsau2u:1284: viṣaṃ pītvā yadagadaṃ samaye pātumicchasi // Saund_12.25 //
GK19asvsau2u:1288: sadoṣaṃ salilaṃ dṛṣṭvā pathineva pipāsunā // Saund_12.27 //
GK19asvsau2u:1290: rajasā caṇḍavātena vivasvata iva prabhā // Saund_12.28 //
GK19asvsau2u:1291: sā jighāṃsustamo hārdaṃ yā saṃprati vijṛmbhate /
GK19asvsau2u:1292: tamo naiśaṃ prabhā saurī vinirgīrṇeva meruṇā // Saund_12.29 //
GK19asvsau2u:1294: yatte syānnaiṣṭhike sūkṣme śreyasi śraddadhānatā // Saund_12.30 //
GK19asvsau2u:1298: śayyābuddhau ca śayanaṃ sthānabuddhau tathā sthitiḥ // Saund_12.32 //
GK19asvsau2u:1300: arthiṃtve sati yatnena tadā khanati gāmimām // Saund_12.33 //
GK19asvsau2u:1301: nārthī yadyagninā vā syācchraddadhyāttaṃ na vāraṇau /
GK19asvsau2u:1303: sasyotpattiṃ yadi na vā śraddadhyāt kārṣakaḥ kṣitau /
GK19asvsau2u:1304: arthī sasyena vā na syād bījāni na vaped bhuvi // Saund_12.35 //
GK19asvsau2u:1305: ataśca hasta ityuktā mayā śraddhā viśeṣataḥ /

GK19asvsau2u:1314: mayoktā kāryatastasmāttatra tatra tathā tathā // Saund_12.40 //
GK19asvsau2u:1316: tadvṛddhau vardhate dharmo mūlavṛddhau yathā drumaḥ // Saund_12.41 //
GK19asvsau2u:1317: vyākulaṃ darśanaṃ yasya durbalo yasya niścayaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1318: tasya pāriplavā śraddhā na hiṃ kṛtyāya vartate // Saund_12.42 //
GK19asvsau2u:1319: yāvattattvaṃ na bhavati hi dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ vā tāvacchraddhā na bhavati balasthā sthirā vā /
GK19asvsau2u:1320: dṛṣṭe tattve niyamaparibhūtendriyasya śraddhāvṛkṣo bhavati saphalaścāśrayaśca // Saund_12.43
GK19asvsau2u:1321: saundarananda mahākāvya meṃ “viveka” nāmaka dvādaśa sarga samāpta /
GK19asvsau2u:1322: trayodaśaḥ sargaḥ śīla evaṃ indriyasaṃyama atha saṃrādhito nandaḥ śraddhāṃ prati maharṣiṇā
GK19asvsau2u:1324: kṛtārthamiva taṃ mene saṃbuddhaḥ śraddhayā tayā /

GK19asvsau2u:1326: ślakṣṇena vacasā kāṃścit kāṃścit paruṣayā girā /
GK19asvsau2u:1328: pāṃsubhyaḥ kāñcanaṃ jātaṃ viśuddhaṃ nirmalaṃ śuci /
GK19asvsau2u:1329: sthitaṃ pāṃsuṣvapi yathā pāṃsudoṣairna lipyate // Saund_13.4 //
GK19asvsau2u:1330: padmaparṇaṃ yathā caiva jale jātaṃ jale sthitam /
GK19asvsau2u:1334: śleṣaṃ tyāgaṃ priyaṃ rūkṣaṃ kathāṃ ca dhyānameva ca /
GK19asvsau2u:1339: abravīd bruvatāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ kramajñaḥ śreyasāṃ kramam // Saund_13.9 //
GK19asvsau2u:1342: prayogaḥ kāyavacasoḥ śuddho bhavati te yathā /
GK19asvsau2u:1359: asya nāśena naiva syāt pravrajyā na gṛhasthatā // Saund_13.19 //
GK19asvsau2u:1362: śīlamāsthāya vartante sarvā hi śreyasi kriyāḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1373: ataḥ śīlaṃ nayatyagryamiti śīlaṃ viśodhaya // Saund_13.26 //
GK19asvsau2u:1376: śīlaṃ hi śaraṇaṃ saubhya kāntāra iva daiśikaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1377: pitraṃ bandhuśca rakṣā ca dhanaṃ ca balameva ca // Saund_13.28 //
GK19asvsau2u:1383: indriyebhyo yathā svebhyastairajasraṃ hi hanyate // Saund_13.31 //
GK19asvsau2u:1384: dviṣadbhiḥ śatrubhiḥ kaścit kadācit pīḍyate na vā /
GK19asvsau2u:1385: indriyairbādhyate sarvaḥ sarvatra ca sadaiva ca // Saund_13.32 //
GK19asvsau2u:1388: hanyamānasya tairduḥkhaṃ hārdaṃ bhavati vā na vā /
GK19asvsau2u:1393: vihanyante yadi na te tataḥ patanti taiḥ kṣatāḥ // Saund_13.36 //
GK19asvsau2u:1397: sukhaṃ svapiti vāste vā yatra tatra gatoddhavaḥ // Saund_13.38 //
GK19asvsau2u:1403: nimittaṃ tatra na grāhyamanuvyañjanameva ca // Saund_13.41 //
GK19asvsau2u:1405: strī veti puruṣo veti na kalpayitumarhasi // Saund_13.42 //
GK19asvsau2u:1408: nāpaneyaṃ tataḥ kiṃcit prakṣepyaṃ nāpi kiñcana /
GK19asvsau2u:1409: draṣṭavyaṃ bhūtato bhūtaṃ yādṛśaṃ ca yathā ca yat // Saund_13.44 //
GK19asvsau2u:1417: śarma nāpnoti na śreyaścalendriyamato jagat // Saund_13.48 //
GK19asvsau2u:1420: indhane sati vāyau ca yathā jvalati pāvakaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1423: tameva viṣayaṃ paśyan bhūtataḥ parimucyate // Saund_13.51 //
GK19asvsau2u:1426: ato na viṣayo heturbandhāya na vimuktaye /
GK19asvsau2u:1427: parikalpaviśeṣeṇa saṃgo bhavati vā na vā // Saund_13.53 //
GK19asvsau2u:1429: indriyāṇi hyagutpāni duḥkhāya ca bhavāya ca // Saund_13.54 //
GK19asvsau2u:1431: indriyoragairmanobilaśrayaiḥ spṛhāviṣaiḥ śamāgadādṛte na dṛṣṭamasti yaccikitset // Saund_13.55
GK19asvsau2u:1433: sarvāvasthaṃ bhava viniyamādapramatto māsminnarthe kṣaṇamapi kṛthāstvaṃ pramādam // Saund_13.56
GK19asvsau2u:1434: saundarananda mahākāvye “śīla evaṃ indriyasaṃyama” nāma trayodaśa sarga
GK19asvsau2u:1436: caturdaśaḥ sargaḥ ādiprasthāna atha smṛtikavāṭena pidhāyendriyasaṃvaram /
GK19asvsau2u:1437: bhojane bhava mātrājño dhyānāyānāmayāya ca // Saund_14.1 //
GK19asvsau2u:1439: kṛto hyatyarthamāhāro vihanti ca parākramam // Saund_14.2 //
GK19asvsau2u:1445: samā tiṣṭhati yuktena bhojyeneyaṃ tathā tanuḥ // Saund_14.5 //
GK19asvsau2u:1447: nātimātraṃ na cātyalpaṃ meyaṃ mānavaśādapi // Saund_14.6 //
GK19asvsau2u:1451: anāhāro hi nirvāti nirindhana ivānalaḥ // Saund_14.8 //
GK19asvsau2u:1453: tasmād duṣyati nāhāro vikalpo 'tra tu vāryate // Saund_14.9 //
GK19asvsau2u:1455: avijñāte yathāhāre boddhavyaṃ tatra kāraṇam // Saund_14.10 //
GK19asvsau2u:1463: na bhūṣārthaṃ na vapuṣo na madāya na dṛptaye // Saund_14.14 //
GK19asvsau2u:1466: plavaṃ yatnād yathā kaścid badhnīyād dhārayedapi /

GK19asvsau2u:1974: upekṣakaḥ sa smṛtimān vyahārṣid dhyānaṃ tṛtīyaṃ pratilabhya dhīraḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:1975: yasmāt paraṃ tatra sukhaṃ sukhebhyastataḥ paraṃ nāsti sukhapravṛttiḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1976: tasmād babhāṣe śubhakṛtsnabhūmiḥ parāparajñaḥ parameti maitryā //
GK19asvsau2u:1977: dhyāne 'pi tatrātha dadarśa doṣaṃ mene paraṃ śāntamaniñjameva /
GK19asvsau2u:1978: ābhogato 'pīñjayati sma tasya cittaṃ pravṛttaṃ sukhamityasram //
GK19asvsau2u:1979: yatreñjitaṃ spanditamasti tatra yatrāsti ca spanditamasti duḥkham /
GK19asvsau2u:1981: atha prahāṇāt sukhaduḥkhayośca manovikārasya ca pūrvameva /
GK19asvsau2u:1983: yasmāttu tasminna sukhaṃ na duḥkhaṃ jñānaṃ ca tatrāsti tadarthacāri /
GK19asvsau2u:1985: dhyānaṃ sa niśritya tataścaturthamarhattvalābhāya matiṃ cakāra /
GK19asvsau2u:1986: saṃdhāya mitraṃ balavantamāryaṃ rājeva deśānajitān jigīṣuḥ // Saund_17.56
GK19asvsau2u:1987: ciccheda kārtsnyena tataḥ sa pañca prajñāsinā bhāvanayeritena /
GK19asvsau2u:1989: bodhyaṅganāgairapi saptabhiḥ sa saptaiva cittānuśayān mamarda /
GK19asvsau2u:1990: dvipānivopasthitavipraṇāśān kālo grahaiḥ saptabhireva sapta // Saund_17.58
GK19asvsau2u:1992: doṣeṣu tāṃ vṛttimiyāya nando nirvāpaṇotpāṭanadāhaśoṣaiḥ // Saund_17.59 //
GK19asvsau2u:1993: iti trivegaṃ trijhaṣaṃ trivicamekāmbhasaṃ pañcarayaṃ dvikūlam /
GK19asvsau2u:1995: arhattvamāsādya sa satkriyārho nirutsuko niṣpraṇayo nirāśaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:1996: vibhīrviśugvītamado virāgaḥ sa eva dhṛtyānya ivābabhāse // Saund_17.61 //
GK19asvsau2u:1997: bhrātuśca śāstuśca tayānuśiṣṭyā nandastataḥ svena ca vikrameṇa /
GK19asvsau2u:1999: namo 'stu tasmai sugatāya yena hitaiṣiṇā me karuṇātmakena /
GK19asvsau2u:2001: ahaṃ hyanāryeṇa śarīrajena duḥkhātmake vartmani kṛṣyamāṇaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:2004: adyaiva tāvat sumahat sukhaṃ me sarvakṣaye kiṃbata nirvṛtasya //
GK19asvsau2u:2005: nirvāpya kāmāgnimahaṃ hi dīptaṃ dhṛtyambunā pāvakamambuneva /
GK19asvsau2u:2006: hlādaṃ paraṃ sāṃpratamāgato 'smi śītaṃ hradaṃ gharma ivāvatīrṇaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:2007: na me priyaṃ kiṃcana nāpriyaṃ me na me 'nurodho 'sti kuto virodhaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:2010: mahārṇavāt pāramivāplavaḥ san bhīmāndhakārādiva ca prakāśam // Saund_17.68
GK19asvsau2u:2012: dviṣatsakāśādiva cāpayānaṃ durbhikṣayogācca yathā subhikṣam // Saund_17.69
GK19asvsau2u:2014: karomi bhūyaḥ punaruktamasmai namo namo 'rhāya tathāgatāya // Saund_17.70
GK19asvsau2u:2015: yenāhaṃ girimupanīya rūkmaśṛṅgaṃ svargaṃ ca plavagavadhūnidarśanena /
GK19asvsau2u:2018: śānte 'smin virajasi vijvare viśoke saddharme vitamasi naiṣṭhike vimuktaḥ
GK19asvsau2u:2019: taṃ vande paramanukampakaṃ maharṣi mūrdhnāhaṃ prakṛtiguṇajñamāśayajñam /
GK19asvsau2u:2020: saṃbuddhaṃ daśabalinaṃ bhiṣakpradhānaṃ trātāraṃ punarapi cāsmi saṃnatastam
GK19asvsau2u:2021: saundarananda mahākāvya meṃ “amṛtaprāpti” nāmaka saptadaśa sarga samāpta /
GK19asvsau2u:2022: aṣṭādaśaḥ sargaḥ ājñāvyākaraṇa atha dvijo bāla ivāptavedaḥ kṣipraṃ vaṇik prāpta ivāptalābhaḥ
GK19asvsau2u:2023: jitvā ca rājanya ivārisainyaṃ nandaḥ kṛtārtho gurumabhyagacchat //
GK19asvsau2u:2024: draṣṭuṃ sukhaṃ jñānasamāptikāle gururhi śiṣyasya gurośca śiṣyaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:2025: pariśramaste saphalo mayīti yato didṛkṣāsya munau babhūva // Saund_18.2 //
GK19asvsau2u:2027: āryaḥ sarāgo 'pi kṛtajñabhāvāt prakṣīṇamānaḥ kimu vītarāgaḥ // Saund_18.3
GK19asvsau2u:2028: yasyārthakāmaprabhavā hi bhaktistato 'sya sā tiṣṭhati rūḍhamūlā /
GK19asvsau2u:2029: dharmānvayo yasya tu bhaktirāgastasya prasādo hṛdayāvagāḍhaḥ // Saund_18.4
GK19asvsau2u:2030: kāṣāyavāsāḥ kanakāvadātastataḥ sa mūrdhnā gurave praṇeme /
GK19asvsau2u:2032: athātmanaḥ śiṣyaguṇasya caiva mahāmuneḥ śāstṛguṇasya caiva /
GK19asvsau2u:2033: saṃdarśanārthaṃ sa na mānahetoḥ svāṃ kāryasiddhiṃ kathayāmbabhūva //
GK19asvsau2u:2034: yo dṛṣṭiśalyo hṛdayāvagāḍhaḥ prabho bhṛśaṃ māmatudat sutīkṣṇaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:2035: tvadvākyasaṃdaṃśamukhena me sa samuddhṛtaḥ śalyahṛteva śalyaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:2036: kathaṃkathābhāvagatosmi yena chinnaḥ sa niḥsaṃśaya saṃśayo me /
GK19asvsau2u:2039: tanme hataṃ tvadvacanāgadena viṣaṃ vināśīva mahāgadena // Saund_18.9 //
GK19asvsau2u:2040: kṣayaṃ gataṃ janma nirastajanman saddharmacaryāmuṣito 'smi samyak /
GK19asvsau2u:2041: kṛtsnaṃ kṛtaṃ me kṛtakārya kāryaṃ lokeṣu bhūto 'smi na lokadharmā //
GK19asvsau2u:2043: tavāsmi gāṃ sādhu nipīya tṛptastṛṣeva gāmuttama vatsavarṇaḥ // Saund_18.11
GK19asvsau2u:2044: yatpaśyataścādhigamo mamāyaṃ tanme samāsena mune nibodha /
GK19asvsau2u:2045: sarvajña kāmaṃ viditaṃ tavaitat svaṃ tūpacāraṃ pravivakṣurasmi //
GK19asvsau2u:2046: anye 'pi santo vimumukṣavo hi śrutvā vimokṣāya nayaṃ parasya /
GK19asvsau2u:2047: muktasya rogādiva rogavantastenaiva mārgeṇa sukhaṃ ghaṭante // Saund_18.13
GK19asvsau2u:2048: urvyādikān janmani vedima dhātun nātmānamurvyādiṣu teṣu kiñcit /
GK19asvsau2u:2049: yasmādatasteṣu na me 'sti saktirbahiśca kāyena samā matirme // Saund_18.14
GK19asvsau2u:2053: tasmādanityeṣu nirātmakeṣu duḥkheṣu me teṣvapi nāsti saṃgaḥ // Saund_18.16
GK19asvsau2u:2054: yataśca lokaṃ samajanmaniṣṭhaṃ paśyāmi niḥsāramasacca sarvam /
GK19asvsau2u:2055: ato dhiyā me manasā vibaddhamasmīti me neñjitamasti yena // Saund_18.17 //
GK19asvsau2u:2057: amūrcchitaścāgrathitaśca tatra tribhyo vimukto 'smi tato bhavebhyaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:2059: yasmāt samātmānugataśca tatra tasmād visaṃyogagato 'smi muktaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:2060: ityevamuktvā gurubāhumānyāt sarveṇa kāyena sa gāṃ nipannaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:2061: praverito lohitacandanākto haimo mahāstambha ivābabhāse // Saund_18.20 //
GK19asvsau2u:2062: tataḥ pramādat prasṛtasya pūrvaṃ śruvā dhṛtiṃ vyākaraṇaṃ ca tasya /
GK19asvsau2u:2064: uttiṣṭha dharme sthita śiṣyajuṣṭe kiṃ pādayorme patito 'si murdhnā /
GK19asvsau2u:2065: abhyarcanaṃ me na tathā praṇāmo dharme yathaiṣā pratipattireva //
GK19asvsau2u:2067: jitātmanaḥ pravrajanaṃ hi sādhu calātmano na tvajitendriyasya //
GK19asvsau2u:2068: adyāsi śaucena pareṇa yukto vākkāyacetāṃsi śucīni yatte /
GK19asvsau2u:2069: ataḥ punaścāprayatāpasaumyāṃ yatsaumya no vekṣyasi garbhaśayyām //
GK19asvsau2u:2071: kṛtaśruto vipratipadyamāno nindyo hi nirvīrya ivāttaśastraḥ // Saund_18.25
GK19asvsau2u:2073: yāsyāmi niṣṭhāmiti bāliśo hi janmakṣayāt trāsamihābhyupaiti // Saund_18.26
GK19asvsau2u:2074: diṣṭyā durāpaḥ kṣaṇasaṃnipāto nāyaṃ kṛto mohavaśena moghaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:2075: udeti duḥkhena gato hyadhastāt kūrmo yugacchidra ivārṇavasthaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:2076: nirjitya māraṃ yudhi durnivāramadyāsi loke raṇaśīrṣaśūraḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:2077: śūro 'pyaśūraḥ sa hi veditavyo doṣairamitrairiva hanyate yaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:2078: nirvāpya rāgāgnimudīrṇamadya diṣṭyā sukhaṃ svapsyasi vītadāhaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:2079: duḥkhaṃ hi śete śayane 'pyudāre kleśāgninā cetasi dahyamānaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:2081: yāvat satarṣaḥ puruṣo hi loke tāvat samṛddho 'pi sadā daridraḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:2082: adyāpadeṣṭuṃ tava yuktarūpaṃ śuddhodano me nṛpatiḥ piteti /
GK19asvsau2u:2085: sarvo hi saṃsāragato bhayārto yathaiva kāntāragatastathaiva // Saund_18.32
GK19asvsau2u:2086: āraṇyakaṃ bhaikṣacaraṃ vinītaṃ drakṣyāmi nandaṃ nibhṛtaṃ kadeti /
GK19asvsau2u:2087: āsīt purastāttvayi me didṛkṣā tathāsi diṣṭyā mama darśanīyaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:2088: bhavatyarūpo 'pi hi darśanīyaḥ svalaṃkṛtaḥ śreṣṭhatamaigurṇaiḥ svaiḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:2089: doṣaiḥ parīto malinīkaraistu sudarśanīyo 'pi virūpa eva // Saund_18.34 //
GK19asvsau2u:2090: adya prakṛṣṭā tava buddhimattā kṛtsnaṃ yayā te kṛtamātmakāryam /
GK19asvsau2u:2091: śrutonnatasyāpi hi nāsti buddhirnotpadyate śreyasi yasya buddhiḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:2092: unmīlitasyāpi janasya madhye nimīlitasyāpi tathaiva cakṣuḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:2093: prajñāmayaṃ yasya hi nāsti cakṣuścakṣurna tasyāsti sacakṣuṣo 'pi //
GK19asvsau2u:2095: ajasramāgacchati tacca bhūyo jñānena yasyādya kṛtastvayāntaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:2096: duḥkhaṃ na me syāt sukhameva me syāditi pravṛttaḥ satataṃ hi lokaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:2097: na vetti taccaiva tathā yathā syāt prāptaṃ tvayādyāsulabhaṃ yathāvat //
GK19asvsau2u:2099: staveṣu nindāsu ca nirvyapekṣaḥ kṛtāñjalirvākyamuvāca nandaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:2100: aho viśeṣeṇa viśeṣadarśin stvayānukampā mayi darśiteyaṃ /
GK19asvsau2u:2102: bhrātrā tvayā śreyasi daiśikena pitrā phalasthena tathaiva mātrā /
GK19asvsau2u:2103: hato 'bhaviṣyaṃ yadi na vyamokṣyaṃ sārthāt paribhraṣṭa ivākṛtārthaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:2104: śāntasya tuṣṭasya sukho viveko vijñātatattvasva parīkṣakasya /
GK19asvsau2u:2105: prahīṇamānasya ca nirmadasya sukhaṃ virāgatvamasaktabuddheḥ // Saund_18.42
GK19asvsau2u:2106: atho hi tattvaṃ parigamya samyaṅnirdhūya doṣānadhigamya śāntim /
GK19asvsau2u:2107: svaṃ nāśramaṃ samprati cintayāmi na taṃ janaṃ nāpsaraso na devān //
GK19asvsau2u:2108: idaṃ hi bhuktvā śuci śāmikaṃ sukhaṃ na me manaḥ kāṃkṣati kāmajaṃ sukham /
GK19asvsau2u:2110: aho 'ndhavijñānanimīlitaṃ jagat paṭāntare paśyati nottamaṃ sukham /
GK19asvsau2u:2111: sudhīramadhyatmasukhaṃ vyapāsya hi śramaṃ tathā kāmasukhārthamṛcchati //
GK19asvsau2u:2112: yathā hi ratnākarametya durmatirvihāya ratnānyasato maṇīn haret /
GK19asvsau2u:2113: apāsya saṃbodhisukhaṃ tathottamaṃ śramaṃ vrajet kāmasukhopalabdhaye //
GK19asvsau2u:2115: apāsya yaddhyānasukhaṃ mune paraṃ parasya duḥkhoparamāya khidyase //
GK19asvsau2u:2116: mayā nu śakyaṃ pratikartumadya kiṃ gurau hitaiṣiṇyanukampake tvayi /
GK19asvsau2u:2118: tato ministasya niśamya hetumat prahīṇasarvāsravasūcakaṃ vacaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:2119: idaṃ babhāṣe vadatāmanuttamo yadarhati śrīghana eva bhāṣituṃ //
GK19asvsau2u:2120: idaṃ kṛtārthaḥ paramārthavit kṛtī tvameva dhīmannabhidhātumarhasi /
GK19asvsau2u:2123: na dṛṣṭasatyo 'pi tathāvabudhyate pṛthagjanaḥ kiṃbata buddhimānapi //
GK19asvsau2u:2125: rajaḥprakarṣeṇa jagatyavasthite kṛtajñabhāvo hi kṛtajña durlabhaḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:2126: sadharma dharmānvayato yataśca te mayi prasādo 'dhigame ca kauśalam /
GK19asvsau2u:2127: ato 'sti bhūyastvayi me vivakṣitaṃ nato hi bhaktaśca niyogamarhasi //
GK19asvsau2u:2128: avāptakāryo 'si parāṃ gatiṃ gato na te 'sti kiñcit karaṇīyamaṇvapi /
GK19asvsau2u:2129: ataḥparaṃ saumya carānukampayā vimokṣayan kṛcchragatān parānapi //
GK19asvsau2u:2132: ihottamebhyo 'pi mataḥ sa tūttamo ya uttamaṃ dharmamavāpya naiṣṭhikam /
GK19asvsau2u:2134: vihāya tasmādiha kāryamātmanaḥ kuru sthirātman parakāryamapyatho /
GK19asvsau2u:2135: bhramatsu sattveṣu tamāvṛtātmasu śrutapradīpo niśi dhāryatāmayam //
GK19asvsau2u:2136: bravītu tāvat puri vismito janastvayi sthite kurvati dharmadeśanāḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:2137: aho batāścaryamidaṃ vimuktaye karoti rāgī yadayaṃ kathāmiti // Saund_18.58
GK19asvsau2u:2138: dhruvaṃ hi saṃśrutya tava sthiraṃ mano nivṛttanānāviṣayairmanorathaiḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:2139: vadhūrgṛhe sāpi tavānukurvatī kariṣyate strīṣu virāgiṇīḥ kathāḥ //
GK19asvsau2u:2140: tvayi paramadhṛtau niviṣṭatattve bhavanagatā na hi raṃsyate dhruvaṃ sā /
GK19asvsau2u:2141: manasi śamadamātmake vivikte matiriva kāmasukhaiḥ parīkṣakasya //
GK19asvsau2u:2142: ityarhataḥ paramakāruṇikasya śāsturmūrdhnā vacaśca caraṇau ca samaṃ gṛhītvā /
GK19asvsau2u:2143: svasthaḥ praśāntahṛdayo vinivṛttakāryaḥ pārśvānmuneḥ pratiyayau vimadaḥ karīva // Saund_18.61
GK19asvsau2u:2144: bhikṣārthaṃ samaye viveśa sa puraṃ dṛṣṭīrjanasyākṣipan lābhālābhasukhāsukhādiṣu samaḥ svasthendriyo nispṛhaḥ /
GK19asvsau2u:2145_0: nirmokṣāya cakāra tatra ca kathāṃ kāle janāyārthine naivonmārgagatān parān paribhavannātmānamutkarṣayan ityeṣā vyupaśāntaye
GK19asvsau2u:2145_1: na rataye mokṣārthagarbhā kṛtiḥ śrotṛṇāṃ grahaṇārthamanyamanasāṃ kāvyopacārāt kṛtā /
GK19asvsau2u:2146: yanmokṣāt kṛtamanyadatra hi mayā tatkāvyadharmāt kṛtaṃ pātuṃ titkamivauṣadhaṃ madhuyutaṃ hṛdyaṃ kathaṃ syāditi //
GK19asvsau2u:2147: prāyeṇālokya lokaṃ viṣayaratiparaṃ mokṣāt pratihataṃ kāvyavyājena tattvaṃ kathitamiha mayā mokṣaḥ paramiti /
GK19asvsau2u:2148: tadbuddhvā śamikaṃ yattadavahitamito grāhyaṃ na lalitaṃ pāṃsubhyo dhātujebhyo niyatamupakaraṃ cāmīkaramiti // Saund_18.64 //
GK19asvsau2u:2149: saundarananda mahākāvya meṃ “ājñāvyākaraṇa” nāmaka aṣṭādaśa sarga samāpta
